data.name: apInfo
data.value: All your stamina is converted into an action points. On exit unused action points are converted back to stamina.

data.name: arenaBossFightText
data.value: Fight in the Colliseum with a champion

data.name: arenaEasyFightText
data.value: Fight in the public with easy opponent

data.name: arenaEntryText
data.value: You arrive at the arena guild. Here you can submit to a fight with an enemy of your choosing. To be able to fight in bigger leagues you will need to earn fame by winning easier fights. You need 50 fame to enter medium league, 100 to enter big leagues and 200 to enter the Colliseum. Be ware though, if you loose fight, your fame will also drop as well as your gold.

data.name: arenaFameRewardText
data.value: If you are doing exceptionally well here you can exchange your excess fame points for displayed item.

data.name: arenaHardFightText
data.value: Fight in more prestigous arena with hard opponent

data.name: arenaLostGold
data.value: You lost the fight in the arena. You have lost :

data.name: arenaMediumFightText
data.value: Fight in the small arena with medium opponent

data.name: arenaSpeedup
data.value: Do you want to speed up waiting for another fight?

data.name: backgroundBlacksmith
data.value: You worked as an apprentice of a great blacksmith. After years of practice, you couldn't get a hang of forging anything more complex than a horseshoe. You decided to leave this life behind and try your luck in the arena.

data.name: backgroundBuilder
data.value: From a young age, you worked as a builder to earn some money for your family. You hated every second of it. After over a dozen years, every last member of your family was either drafted in the army or died of exhaustion and illness. Being on your own, you decided to not go out without a fight and started a gladiator's life.

data.name: backgroundDeserter
data.value: You got drafted to the Roman army after they conquered your homeland. You were used as a barely armed bait for enemy forces. After a couple of skirmishes, your whole regiment was obliterated, leaving only you behind. Having nothing to lose, you decided to join gladiator fights.

data.name: backgroundFarmer
data.value: You led a quiet life, working in the fields for some rich lord. After a long time of being exploited and underpaid, you decided to leave and start the life of a gladiator.

data.name: backgroundSlaver
data.value: You worked as an assistant of a slave trader. Your job was to tend to the slaves and ready them for sale. For years, you took good care of them as many slaves came by and were sold away. One night, the slaves rebelled. They killed everyone except you for being good for them. The image of the slaughter was branded into your mind, and you were intrigued by it. You decided that you want to recreate it by fighting in the arena.

data.name: backgroundThief
data.value: You were on your own for as long as you remember. You lived off scraps left by other people and stole what you could. Long time passed, but each year was harder for you to stay alive. No one wanted to hire you because at some point you stole from them. As your last resort, you decided to try to live as long as possible as a gladiator.

data.name: banditCampAmbush
data.value: As you make your way through the stronghold, you enter a spacious chamber filled with various obstacles arranged in a manner that suggests careful preparation for an ambush. The layout is not haphazard; instead, it seems purposefully designed to hinder movement and create potential hiding spots. Your senses immediately prick up as you take in the scene before you. Among the obstacles, you notice subtle signs that betray the presence of hidden adversaries. Glints of metal catch your eye, hinting at concealed weapons strategically positioned behind barriers. A faint rustle of movement reaches your ears, and you catch glimpses of shifting shadows, indicating the presence of unseen figures lying in wait.

data.name: banditCampAmbush1_1
data.value: With the realization that an ambush awaits, you swiftly assess your surroundings, your senses keen and your muscles tensed for action. Gripping your weapon tightly, you ready yourself for the imminent confrontation with the hidden assailants. Drawing upon your training and experience, you formulate a plan of attack, identifying potential avenues of approach and strategizing how best to engage the enemy. Every movement is deliberate, every breath measured as you prepare to confront the bandits lying in wait.

data.name: banditCampAmbush1_5
data.value: With lightning reflexes and unwavering determination, you swiftly dispatch the hidden assailants, each strike precise and calculated. Despite the ambushers' cunning tactics, you remain one step ahead, countering their every move with skill and finesse. As the last foe falls, you stand victorious amidst the defeated bandits, your resolve unbroken. Taking a moment to catch your breath, you press onward, knowing that no obstacle can stand in the way of your ultimate goal.

data.name: banditCampAmbush1_6
data.value: Despite your best efforts, the ambushers prove to be formidable adversaries, overwhelming you with their coordinated attacks and cunning tactics. Despite your skill and determination, you find yourself outmatched, forced to retreat in the face of overwhelming odds, knowing that discretion is the better part of valor.

data.name: banditCampAmbush2_1
data.value: Recognizing the danger of confronting the ambushers head-on, you quickly pivot and begin to seek an alternate route through the chamber, deftly navigating around obstacles to evade the hidden assailants lying in wait. With each calculated step, you remain vigilant, scouting for a path that will lead you safely past the danger zone. As you navigate through the labyrinthine corridors, your senses heightened, you feel a surge of relief as you find a hidden passage that circumvents the ambushers' trap, allowing you to continue your journey undetected.

data.name: banditCampAmbush2_3
data.value: With a silent nod of satisfaction, you press forward, knowing that your quick thinking has spared you from a potentially deadly confrontation.

data.name: banditCampBandit
data.value: As you traverse the stronghold, your path intersects with that of a lone bandit, who meets your gaze with a mixture of hostility and desperation. Without hesitation, the bandit draws their weapon, a glint of steel flashing in the dim light of the chamber, and moves to attack. Reacting swiftly, you ready your own weapon, steeling yourself for the imminent confrontation. With adrenaline coursing through your veins, you engage the bandit in a fierce and frenzied exchange of blows, each strike fueled by determination and resolve.

data.name: banditCampBandit1_1
data.value: The clash is intense, the sound of metal ringing out as your weapons meet in a symphony of combat. Despite the bandit's ferocity, you hold your ground, your skill and training serving you well as you fend off their relentless assault. With each passing moment, you gain the upper hand, your movements becoming more fluid and precise as you wear down the bandit's defenses.

data.name: banditCampBandit1_5
data.value: Finally, with a decisive strike, you incapacitate your adversary, leaving them defeated at your feet as you emerge victorious from the skirmish.

data.name: banditCampBandit1_6
data.value: Despite your efforts, the bandit proves too skilled, gradually wearing you down with relentless attacks. Struggling to keep up, you falter, your strength waning until a final blow leaves you incapacitated, defeated on the ground.

data.name: banditCampBanditGroup
data.value: As you come upon the group of bandits, you notice that they are surprisingly young, their faces marked with the innocence of youth and lacking the hardened demeanor of experienced warriors. Despite their lack of battle scars, however, their posture exudes a sense of uncertainty and apprehension. Caught off guard by your sudden appearance, the young bandits exchange nervous glances, their hands fidgeting with their weapons as they struggle to maintain their composure. It's clear that they are out of their depth, unaccustomed to facing strangers in the depths of the stronghold.

data.name: banditCampBanditGroup1_1
data.value: With a steely resolve, you square your shoulders and adopt a commanding posture, radiating an aura of authority and intimidation. Despite the bandits' youth and inexperience, they instinctively recognize the assertiveness in your stance, and a flicker of uncertainty crosses their faces. Without uttering a word, you lock eyes with each of the young bandits in turn, your gaze unwavering and filled with unspoken menace. In the silence that follows, the tension in the air becomes palpable, and the bandits begin to shift uncomfortably under your scrutiny. Sensing their growing unease, you take a deliberate step forward, your movements calculated and deliberate. The subtle shift in your posture sends a clear message of dominance, and the young bandits instinctively take a hesitant step back, their bravado faltering in the face of your silent intimidation.

data.name: banditCampBanditGroup1_2
data.value: As your attempt to intimidate the young bandits proves ineffective, tension mounts, and the atmosphere becomes charged with hostility. With a sudden surge of aggression, the bandits abandon their hesitance and launch into a reckless charge, their weapons brandished with newfound ferocity. Caught off guard by their sudden assault, you brace yourself for the onslaught, adrenaline coursing through your veins as you prepare to defend yourself. With swift reflexes, you draw your own weapon, ready to meet the bandits' attack head-on.

data.name: banditCampBanditGroup1_3
data.value: With a sense of satisfaction, you hold your ground, your presence alone enough to instill fear in the hearts of the young bandits. Without a word spoken, they turn and flee, disappearing into the shadows of the stronghold, their footsteps echoing in the distance.

data.name: banditCampBanditGroup1_5
data.value: With practiced skill, you swiftly overpower the bandits, easily outmaneuvering their clumsy attacks. In a matter of moments, they lie defeated, their weapons scattered at your feet. With a confident nod, you move forward, undeterred by the brief skirmish, knowing that your combat prowess will carry you through any challenge the stronghold may present.

data.name: banditCampBanditGroup1_6
data.value: Despite your best efforts, the bandits press their advantage, their frenzied attacks driving you back with each blow. With each passing moment, the odds stack against you, and you realize that escape may be your only option if you hope to survive this skirmish. With a grim determination, you make a strategic retreat, narrowly evading the bandits' strikes as you seek a path to safety. Though the encounter ends in a narrow escape, you know that the threat of the bandits still looms large in the depths of the stronghold, and you must remain vigilant if you hope to survive another day

data.name: banditCampBanditGroup2_1
data.value: With unwavering resolve, you launch into a fierce assault without hesitation, catching the young bandits off guard with your sudden aggression. Their surprised expressions quickly turn to alarm as you unleash a relentless barrage of strikes, driving them back with each powerful blow.

data.name: banditCampBanditGroup2_5
data.value: Despite their attempts to mount a defense, they are no match for your ferocity and skill. With each strike, you press the advantage, overwhelming them with your relentless onslaught. Before they can fully react, the bandits lie defeated or running away, their weapons clattering to the ground as you stand victorious amidst the chaos. With a steely gaze, you survey the scene, your determination unwavering as you press forward, undeterred by the brief confrontation.

data.name: banditCampBanditGroup2_6
data.value: The skirmish quickly turns against you as the bandits' relentless counterattacks wear you down. Despite your best efforts, their defenses hold firm, and you find yourself overwhelmed by their ferocity. In the end, despite your determination, the bandits emerge victorious, their victory a stark reminder of the dangers that lurk within the stronghold. As you retreat, nursing your wounds and licking your wounds, you vow to return stronger and better prepared for the challenges ahead.

data.name: banditCampBoss
data.value: As you step into the chamber, your eyes fixate on the battle-scarred veteran bandit chieftain, seated upon his makeshift throne. His rugged appearance and commanding presence speak volumes of his authority, earned through countless battles and struggles. In the dim light of the chamber, the chieftain's gaze meets yours with a mix of curiosity and wariness. You can sense the tension in the air as you stand before him, your purpose clear: you have come to challenge and defeat him, to claim victory over the stronghold. Despite the gravity of the situation, the chieftain remains stoic, his expression betraying no hint of fear or doubt. With a silent nod, he acknowledges your presence, silently accepting the challenge that lies before him. As the weight of the impending battle hangs heavy in the air, you steel yourself for the confrontation ahead, knowing that the fate of the stronghold rests on your shoulders.

data.name: banditCampBoss1_1
data.value: The clash begins with a thunderous clash of steel as you and the bandit chieftain engage in a brutal duel. Each blow is met with equal ferocity as you both fight tooth and nail for dominance in the chamber. The chieftain's experience is evident as he deftly parries your attacks, his strikes landing with precision and force. However, you refuse to back down, matching his every move with unwavering determination. As the battle intensifies, you find yourself pushed to your limits, the strain of combat wearing on your body and mind. Yet, with each passing moment, you draw upon your inner strength, refusing to yield to the overwhelming odds stacked against you. With the clash reaching its climax, both you and the chieftain deliver one final, decisive blow, the outcome hanging in the balance as the dust settles in the aftermath of the fierce confrontation.

data.name: banditCampBoss1_5
data.value: With a final, decisive blow, you incapacitate the bandit chieftain, completing your quest. Victorious, you can now return with news of your success, bringing justice to the land and restoring peace to the stronghold.

data.name: banditCampBoss1_6
data.value: Despite your valiant efforts, the bandit chieftain proves to be a formidable opponent, overpowering you with their superior skill and strength. As you struggle to keep up with their relentless assault, a final, decisive blow incapacitates you, leaving you defeated on the ground. As darkness threatens to envelop you, you can't help but feel a sense of disappointment at your failure. With the bandit chieftain still standing, the quest remains uncompleted, and the stronghold continues to suffer under their rule. Defeated and humbled, you can only hope that someone else will rise to the challenge and succeed where you could not.

data.name: banditCampBowman
data.value: As you navigate through the stronghold's corridors, you suddenly find yourself confronted by a lone bowman, his weapon trained directly on you. His stance is one of unwavering determination, and his eyes bore into yours with a steely intensity. Caught off guard by his sudden appearance, you raise your hands in a gesture of surrender, hoping to defuse the tension of the encounter. Despite the precariousness of the situation, you remain calm and composed, meeting the bowman's gaze with a steady resolve.

data.name: banditCampBowman1_1
data.value: With a surge of adrenaline, you charge towards the bowman, hoping to close the distance before he can loose his arrow. Despite your speed, his aim remains true, and with a swift motion, he releases his shot. The arrow finds its mark, sinking deep into your shoulder with a searing pain that threatens to overwhelm you. Despite the injury, you grit your teeth and press forward, determined to reach the bowman before he can fire again.

data.name: banditCampBowman1_5
data.value: With a swift and decisive strike, you knock the bow from his hands, sending it clattering to the ground. Before he can react, you follow up with a flurry of blows, driving him back with the force of your assault. Caught off guard by your relentless attack, the bowman staggers, his defenses faltering under the onslaught. With a final, decisive strike, you incapacitate him, rendering him unable to continue the fight.

data.name: banditCampBowman1_6
data.value: Pain shoots through your body as you stumble back, caught off balance by the unexpected attack. The bowman wastes no time in following up his initial strike, pressing his advantage with a flurry of rapid blows from his dagger. Despite your efforts to defend yourself, the onslaught is too much to bear. With each strike, your strength wanes, and your vision blurs as you struggle to stay upright. In a final, devastating blow, the bowman incapacitates you, leaving you lying on the ground, defeated and helpless. As darkness descends, you can only watch helplessly as the bowman stands over you, triumphant in his victory.

data.name: banditCampBowman2_1
data.value: With a swift motion, you raise your shield, deflecting the arrows with practiced precision as they whistle through the air. Each strike is met with a resounding clang as your shield absorbs the impact, leaving you unscathed and undeterred. As you advance towards the bowman, your weapon at the ready, you emanate an aura of menace and determination. Your gaze is steely, and your movements are purposeful, conveying a silent threat that causes the bowman to falter for a moment. Sensing his uncertainty, you seize the opportunity to press your advantage, closing the distance between you with measured strides. With each step, you loom larger in the bowman's vision, your imposing presence casting a shadow over him.

data.name: banditCampBowman2_2
data.value: With practiced precision, you deflect the first arrow with your shield, the metallic clang echoing through the chamber as it ricochets harmlessly away. But before you can react, the second arrow finds its mark, piercing through your defenses and grazing your arm. Gritting your teeth against the pain, you ignore the injury and surge forward, fueled by adrenaline and determination. With a primal roar, you charge at the bowman, closing the distance with lightning speed.

data.name: banditCampBowman2_3
data.value: As you draw closer, your intimidating demeanor leaves him with no choice but to retreat, his bravado crumbling in the face of your unwavering determination. With a sense of satisfaction, you watch as he slinks away into the shadows, defeated by your sheer willpower and prowess.

data.name: banditCampBowman2_5
data.value: Moments later, the skirmish ends, the bowman defeated at your feet. Breathing heavily, you stand victorious, the taste of triumph sweet on your lips. Despite the setback, your determination has carried you to victory once again.

data.name: banditCampBowman2_6
data.value: However, despite your best efforts, the bowman proves to be a formidable opponent. His movements are quick and precise, and your attacks are met with skillful evasion and counterattacks. Despite your relentless assault, you find yourself unable to gain the upper hand, the bowman's defenses holding firm against your every strike. As the skirmish drags on, exhaustion begins to set in, and the pain from your wound starts to slow your movements. With each passing moment, victory seems to slip further from your grasp, until finally, with a swift and decisive strike, the bowman incapacitates you, leaving you defeated and at his mercy.

data.name: banditCampDungeonEntryText
data.value: Following rumors of the bandit's base led you through the rugged expanse between the mountains, a journey fueled by anticipation and the promise of confrontation. As you approached the concealed entrance, guarded by vigilant sentinels, the confidence of a seasoned adventurer coursed through your veins. With a calm demeanor and steady hand, you dispatched the sentinels without hesitation, their feeble attempts at resistance no match for your skill and experience. As they fell, the path to the bandit's base lay open before you, a testament to your unwavering resolve and the ease with which you overcame the obstacles in your path.

data.name: banditCampHiredMercenary
data.value: As you navigate the stronghold, you encounter a hired mercenary, their steely gaze fixed upon you with a chilling intensity. Without hesitation, the mercenary readies their weapon, a glint of determination in their eyes as they prepare to engage you in combat. With adrenaline coursing through your veins, you brace yourself for the impending confrontation, sizing up your opponent with a careful assessment of their skills and tactics. As the tension mounts, you steel yourself for the intense battle that lies ahead, knowing that victory will require every ounce of your strength and resolve. As you lock eyes with the hired mercenary, a flicker of recognition passes through your mind. Memories of a past encounter flood back to you—the crowded arena, the roar of the crowd, the clash of steel against steel. You realize with a start that you've faced this mercenary before, in the heat of battle within the arena's unforgiving confines.

data.name: banditCampHiredMercenary1_1
data.value: With the memory of your previous encounter fresh in your mind, you square off against the hired mercenary, their weapon poised for combat. Each movement is calculated, every strike delivered with precision as you engage in a fierce duel. The mercenary proves to be a formidable opponent, their skills honed from countless battles in the arena. Despite their relentless assault, you match them blow for blow, drawing upon your own combat prowess to counter their attacks.

data.name: banditCampHiredMercenary1_5
data.value: In the face of the mercenary's formidable skill, you stand firm, countering their every move with precision and determination. With each strike, you gain ground, driving them back until, with a final, decisive blow, you incapacitate your opponent. Victorious, you catch your breath, knowing your hard-fought win is a testament to your strength and resolve, ready to face whatever challenges lie ahead.

data.name: banditCampHiredMercenary1_6
data.value: Despite your best efforts, the mercenary proves to be a formidable adversary, overwhelming you with their relentless assault. Struggling to keep up with their skillful maneuvers, you find yourself gradually worn down by the ferocity of their attacks. With each strike, you fight back with all your might, but the mercenary's superior skill and unwavering determination prove to be too much to overcome. In a final, decisive blow, they incapacitate you, leaving you defeated and at their mercy. As you slump to the ground, the bitter taste of defeat lingers in your mouth, knowing that this time, victory has eluded you.

data.name: banditCampHiredMercenary2_1
data.value: As you face the mercenary, you raise a hand in a gesture of peace, attempting to defuse the situation before it escalates into violence. With a calm and measured tone, you address the mercenary, appealing to their sense of reason. You emphasize the pointlessness of engaging in combat, highlighting the potential for cooperation and mutual benefit instead. You speak of finding common ground and resolving your differences without resorting to violence. Despite the tension in the air, you continue to reason with the mercenary, urging them to consider the consequences of their actions. With each word, you hope to sway them towards a peaceful resolution, avoiding unnecessary conflict and bloodshed.

data.name: banditCampHiredMercenary2_2
data.value: Despite your efforts to reason with the mercenary, they remain steadfast in their resolve, their eyes narrowing with determination. With a shake of their head, they refuse to entertain the notion of a peaceful resolution, raising their weapon in readiness for battle. Realizing that words alone will not sway them, you steel yourself for the impending conflict, knowing that you must defend yourself against their aggression. With a heavy heart, you ready your own weapon, bracing for the clash that seems inevitable.

data.name: banditCampHiredMercenary2_3
data.value: Your words strike a chord with the mercenary, their demeanor softening as they consider your proposition. With a nod of agreement, they lower their weapon, choosing to set aside their aggression in favor of a peaceful resolution. As tension gives way to understanding, you exchange nods of mutual respect, grateful that your words have averted a potentially deadly confrontation. With the threat of violence defused, you both part ways, choosing to walk away unharmed.

data.name: banditCampHiredMercenary2_5
data.value: As the mercenary falls to the ground, defeated, you feel a surge of relief wash over you. With a sense of accomplishment, you lower your weapon, knowing that your skill and determination have secured your victory in the intense battle.

data.name: banditCampHiredMercenary2_6
data.value: Even with your determined efforts, the mercenary proves to be a formidable opponent, overpowering you with their skill and resolve. With each exchange, you find yourself pushed back until, ultimately, a decisive blow incapacitates you, leaving you defeated on the ground. As you gasp for breath, a sense of disappointment washes over you, realizing the outcome of the battle.

data.name: banditCampLeftValuables
data.value: Upon entering the chamber, your senses are assailed by the aroma of a freshly cooked meal, mingling with the stale air of the stronghold. At the center of the room sits a wooden table, strewn with remnants of a feast that seems to have been hastily abandoned. Piles of partially eaten food lie discarded on plates, their contents still warm to the touch. The sight of the leftovers suggests that whoever dined here did so in a hurry, leaving behind a tantalizing array of sustenance. Amidst the scattered plates and utensils, a dozen crates catch your eye, their weathered exteriors hinting at the possibility of valuable contents within. Though your stomach grumbles at the sight of the food, your curiosity is piqued by the potential treasures hidden within the crates.

data.name: banditCampLeftValuables1_1
data.value: As you cautiously approach the nearest crate, the anticipation of discovering hidden treasures pulses through your veins. With a careful tug, you pry open the lid, revealing a trove of valuables nestled within. Gold coins glint in the dim light, accompanied by glittering jewels and other precious artifacts. Excitement courses through you as you delve deeper into the crate, your fingers brushing against the cool metal of the coins and the smooth surface of the jewels. Each new discovery fills you with a sense of exhilaration, as you realize the extent of the riches hidden within the bandit stronghold. As the excitement of uncovering valuable treasures begins to wane, a sense of urgency takes hold. The possibility of the chamber's occupants returning at any moment weighs heavily on your mind, urging you to depart before you overstay your welcome.

data.name: banditCampLeftValuables1_3
data.value: With a quick glance around the chamber, you gather your newfound riches and hastily stash them away, ensuring they are safely concealed from prying eyes. Though the temptation to linger and explore further is strong, you know that discretion is the better part of valor in such precarious circumstances.

data.name: banditCampLeftValuables2_1
data.value: After securing the chamber's entrance, you decide to take a well-deserved respite amidst the remnants of the abandoned feast. The aroma of the still-warm food beckons, enticing you to partake in a moment of relaxation before continuing your exploration. With a weary sigh, you settle into a nearby chair, the worn wood creaking beneath your weight. The soft glow of the dim light casts a comforting ambiance over the chamber, soothing your frayed nerves and weary muscles.

data.name: banditCampLeftValuables2_3
data.value: For a brief moment, all is calm, and you find solace in the simple act of resting amidst the remnants of the abandoned feast.

data.name: banditCampLockedChest
data.value: Amidst the cluttered chambers of the bandit stronghold, your keen eye catches sight of a gleaming treasure chest tucked away in a shadowed corner. Its sturdy construction and ornate design suggest that it holds valuables of significant worth. Approaching with cautious curiosity, you find the chest securely locked, its metal latch gleaming in the dim light. Despite the challenge presented by the locked mechanism, your resolve remains unshaken, for you are no stranger to overcoming obstacles in pursuit of treasure.

data.name: banditCampLockedChest1_1
data.value: Your experienced fingers deftly work the lockpicking tools, each subtle movement bringing you closer to unraveling the mystery of the chest's contents. With a satisfying click, the mechanism yields to your skill, and the latch releases its hold. With a sense of triumph, you swing open the chest to reveal its treasures—a sight to behold. Gold coins gleam in the dim light, precious gems glimmering alongside them. Artifacts of unknown origin lay nestled within, each whispering tales of forgotten times.

data.name: banditCampLockedChest1_2
data.value: Despite your best efforts, the chest remains stubbornly locked, its contents tantalizingly out of reach. With each failed attempt to pick the lock, frustration mounts, but you know that lingering too long could draw unwanted attention. Reluctantly, you abandon your efforts, knowing that time is of the essence. With a heavy heart, you tear yourself away from the chest, leaving its secrets unclaimed for now.

data.name: banditCampLockedChest1_3
data.value: As you gaze upon the bounty before you, a sense of satisfaction washes over you. Your perseverance and skill have paid off, unlocking the secrets hidden within the chest and revealing the rewards that await those bold enough to seek them out.

data.name: banditCampLockedChest1_4
data.value: As you slip away into the shadows, the distant sounds of activity within the stronghold serve as a stark reminder of the dangers that lurk within. Though the chest's treasures remain tantalizingly out of reach, you know that discretion is the better part of valor, and that there will be other opportunities to uncover hidden riches in the future.

data.name: banditCampLockedChest2_1
data.value: Recognizing the risk of drawing unwanted attention, you reluctantly choose to leave the locked chest untouched for now. Though the allure of its potential treasures is strong, you know that attempting to open it could jeopardize your mission within the bandit stronghold. With a sense of frustration tempered by pragmatism, you tear yourself away from the chest, resolving to return another time when the circumstances are more favorable. Though the temptation to linger is strong, you know that discretion is paramount in such perilous surroundings.

data.name: banditCampLockedChest2_3
data.value: As you slip away into the shadows, the distant sounds of activity within the stronghold serve as a stark reminder of the dangers that lurk within. Though the chest's secrets remain tantalizingly out of reach, you know that patience and caution are the wisest course of action for now.

data.name: banditCampMiniBoss
data.value: As you venture deeper into the stronghold, you come face to face with a towering figure—the giant bandit, renowned as the stronghold's most formidable fighter. With muscles bulging beneath their rugged exterior, they exude an aura of intimidation, their presence commanding respect and fear alike. With a menacing glare, the giant bandit locks eyes with you, sizing you up with a mixture of curiosity and hostility. You can't help but feel a shiver of apprehension at the prospect of facing such a formidable opponent, knowing that the battle ahead will be nothing short of intense.

data.name: banditCampMiniBoss1_1
data.value: With adrenaline coursing through your veins, you steel yourself for the daunting challenge of facing the giant bandit, knowing that victory will require every ounce of your strength and skill. As the battle begins, you engage the towering foe in a fierce clash of steel and muscle. The giant bandit proves to be a relentless adversary, their sheer size and power making them a formidable opponent. With each blow they deliver, you feel the force reverberate through your body, testing your endurance and resolve. Despite the overwhelming odds, you refuse to back down, meeting the giant bandit's attacks with calculated precision and unwavering determination. With every strike, you inch closer to victory, driven by the sheer determination to emerge triumphant in the face of adversity.

data.name: banditCampMiniBoss1_5
data.value: After a grueling battle of strength and willpower, you find an opening in the giant bandit's defenses, exploiting it with a well-timed strike. With a final, decisive blow, you incapacitate the formidable foe, leaving them defeated at your feet. As the dust settles and the echoes of battle fade away, a sense of relief washes over you, accompanied by a surge of adrenaline-fueled triumph. With a deep breath, you lower your weapon, knowing that your skill and determination have secured your victory against the stronghold's most fearsome fighter. With the giant bandit vanquished, you stand as a testament to your strength and courage, ready to face whatever challenges may lie ahead. As you take a moment to catch your breath, a sense of pride fills your heart, knowing that you have emerged victorious against all odds.

data.name: banditCampMiniBoss1_6
data.value: Despite your best efforts, the giant bandit proves to be an overwhelming opponent, overpowering you with their immense strength and skill. With each blow they deliver, you find yourself pushed further and further back, until finally, a decisive strike incapacitates you, leaving you defeated on the ground. As you struggle to rise, the weight of defeat bears down on you, your body battered and bruised from the relentless assault. With a heavy heart, you concede defeat to the formidable foe, knowing that this battle was not meant to be won. As the giant bandit stands victorious, you can't help but feel a sense of disappointment at the outcome of the battle. However, you vow to learn from this defeat, knowing that it will only serve to make you stronger in the battles that lie ahead.

data.name: banditCampNursingTent
data.value: As you explore further into the depths of the stronghold, your search leads you to a secluded chamber. Upon entering, you're met with a surprising sight—a makeshift nursing station adorned with medical supplies and remedies. A sense of relief washes over you as you take in the sight of the well-stocked shelves, lined with bottles of potions and salves. Among them, you spot bandages, antiseptics, and various medications neatly arranged in rows, ready to offer aid to those in need.

data.name: banditCampNursingTent1_1
data.value: Quickly tending to your wounds with bandages, you steel yourself for the journey ahead. With determination in your eyes, you press forward, mindful of the need for stealth to avoid detection.

data.name: banditCampNursingTent1_3
data.value: Each step taken brings you closer to your goal, as you navigate the stronghold's corridors with renewed resolve.

data.name: banditCampNursingTent2
data.value: Look for more valuable medicaments to sell (Intelligence)

data.name: banditCampNursingTent2_1
data.value: Driven by the prospect of profit, you scour the nursing chamber for more valuable medications. With careful scrutiny, you uncover a hidden cache of rare potions and remedies tucked away in a corner. Eagerly, you gather these precious items, knowing their worth will fetch a handsome price in the right market. Each vial and potion bottle fills you with anticipation, envisioning the wealth they will bring once sold.

data.name: banditCampNursingTent2_2
data.value: Despite your thorough search, the nursing chamber yields no valuable medications. Each shelf and drawer holds only common remedies and basic supplies, none of which would fetch a significant price in the markets. Frustration gnaws at you as you realize your efforts have been in vain. The prospect of profit slips through your fingers, leaving you empty-handed and disappointed

data.name: banditCampNursingTent2_3
data.value: With your newfound treasures secured, you make a hasty exit from the chamber, eager to capitalize on your discovery before others catch wind of it. As you slip away into the shadows, the weight of your bounty fills you with a sense of satisfaction and anticipation for the riches yet to come.

data.name: banditCampNursingTent2_4
data.value: With a sigh of resignation, you reluctantly accept defeat and make your exit from the chamber. Though your search may have ended in failure, you remain determined to find other opportunities for wealth within the stronghold. With renewed focus, you continue your exploration, hopeful that fortune will smile upon you elsewhere.

data.name: banditCampNursingTent3_1
data.value: Deciding to prioritize your exploration, you leave the nursing chamber without delving deeper into its contents. Though the allure of potential treasures is tempting, you know that time is of the essence, and you cannot afford to waste it on fruitless searches.

data.name: banditCampNursingTent3_3
data.value: With a sense of determination, you turn away from the chamber, the opportunity for profit left unexplored for now. Though a nagging curiosity tugs at your thoughts, you steel yourself against distraction, focused on the task at hand.

data.name: banditCampPendulum
data.value: As you cautiously navigate through the dimly lit corridors of the stronghold, your foot brushes against a hidden pressure plate embedded in the floor. In an instant, a low rumbling fills the air as a trap is triggered, and you instinctively look up to see a massive pendulum swinging down towards you with deadly force.

data.name: banditCampPendulum1_1
data.value: With adrenaline coursing through your veins, you dive out of the pendulum's path just in time, the rush of air as it passes mere inches from your head sending a shiver down your spine. The pendulum crashes into the stone floor with a resounding thud, narrowly missing its mark.

data.name: banditCampPendulum1_2
data.value: Despite your best efforts to evade it, the pendulum swings down with alarming speed, catching you off guard and striking you with brutal force. The impact sends you sprawling to the ground, pain shooting through your body as you feel the full weight of the trap's fury.

data.name: banditCampPendulum1_3
data.value: Heart pounding, you take a moment to catch your breath, grateful for your quick reflexes that saved you from certain harm. With renewed caution, you continue forward, mindful of the dangers that lurk within the stronghold's treacherous corridors.

data.name: banditCampPendulum1_4
data.value: As you struggle to regain your bearings, you realize with a sinking feeling that the blow has left you severely injured. Your vision swims with dizziness, and every movement sends waves of agony coursing through your battered frame. With a grimace, you force yourself to your feet, leaning heavily on your injured limb as you assess the extent of the damage. Though every step is a struggle, you know that you must press on, the thought of retreat never once crossing your mind.

data.name: banditCampRestingCamp
data.value: As you navigate through the labyrinthine corridors of the stronghold, you come across a hidden alcove tucked away from the main thoroughfare. The space is small and unassuming, its entrance obscured by shadows cast by flickering torchlight. Intrigued by the promise of temporary sanctuary, you cautiously approach the alcove, the echo of your footsteps reverberating off the cold stone walls. With a sense of relief, you discover that the alcove offers a secluded spot to rest and recuperate, shielded from the prying eyes of potential adversaries.

data.name: banditCampRestingCamp1_1
data.value: As you navigate through the labyrinthine corridors of the stronghold, you come across a hidden alcove tucked away from the main thoroughfare. The space is small and unassuming, its entrance obscured by shadows cast by flickering torchlight. Intrigued by the promise of temporary sanctuary, you cautiously approach the alcove, the echo of your footsteps reverberating off the cold stone walls. With a sense of relief, you discover that the alcove offers a secluded spot to rest and recuperate, shielded from the prying eyes of potential adversaries. With a grateful nod, you settle into the alcove, allowing the weariness of your journey to wash over you. Though the respite may be temporary, the solitude of the alcove offers a much-needed moment of tranquility amidst the chaos of the stronghold.

data.name: banditCampRestingCamp1_3
data.value: After a brief respite in the secluded alcove, you rise from your makeshift bed, feeling refreshed and revitalized. With renewed determination, you gather your belongings and prepare to continue your journey through the stronghold.

data.name: banditCampRestingCamp2_1
data.value: Despite the allure of the secluded alcove, you hesitate to enter, wary of the risk of being discovered by potential adversaries. Instead, you opt to continue your journey through the stronghold, determined to press on without the temporary sanctuary that the alcove offers.

data.name: banditCampRestingCamp2_3
data.value: With a cautious glance over your shoulder, you steel yourself for the challenges ahead and set off down the winding corridors. Every step is taken with purpose and vigilance, your senses heightened as you remain ever alert to the dangers that lurk around every corner.

data.name: banditCampUnleashedDog
data.value: As you traverse the stronghold, you encounter a houndsman accompanied by a menacing war dog, poised and ready to attack at his command. With a fierce glare, the houndsman releases his formidable companion, unleashing the powerful beast upon you with a chilling growl.

data.name: banditCampUnleashedDog1_1
data.value: With adrenaline fueling your movements, you engage the war dog in a fierce and desperate struggle. The beast lunges at you with gnashing teeth and razor-sharp claws, its relentless attacks testing your reflexes and resolve. Despite the ferocity of your adversary, you stand your ground, meeting each onslaught with swift and calculated strikes. With every blow, you push yourself to the limit, determined to overcome the formidable foe before you.

data.name: banditCampUnleashedDog1_5
data.value: The battle rages on, each moment fraught with danger as you exchange blows with the relentless war dog. With every passing second, your determination grows, driving you to fight with unwavering resolve until, finally, with a final, decisive strike, you emerge victorious, the war dog lying defeated at your feet with his owner nowhere to be seen.

data.name: banditCampUnleashedDog1_6
data.value: Despite your efforts, the war dog overwhelms you with its ferocious attacks, gradually wearing you down until a final, devastating blow leaves you incapacitated, defeated on the ground.

data.name: banditCampUnleashedDog2_1
data.value: As you approach the war dog, you take a moment to carefully observe its movements, analyzing its behavior with a keen eye. With patience and precision, you wait for the opportune moment to act, poised to strike when the time is right.

data.name: banditCampUnleashedDog2_2
data.value: Despite your efforts to read the war dog's movements, its agility and unpredictability confound your senses, leaving you unable to anticipate its attacks with accuracy. As the battle ensues, you find yourself struggling to keep pace with the ferocious canine adversary, each strike catching you off guard and testing your reflexes to their limits.

data.name: banditCampUnleashedDog2_3
data.value: After a tense moment of anticipation, you notice a brief hesitation in the dog's stance, a split-second window of vulnerability that presents itself. Seizing the moment, you move with swift and decisive action, incapacitating the war dog before the battle even begins. With a well-timed maneuver, you subdue the powerful beast, emerging victorious without the need for a prolonged confrontation. Then you look for his owner, but he is nowhere to be seen.

data.name: banditCampUnleashedDog2_5
data.value: Despite struggling to read the war dog's movements, you press on with unwavering determination. Though the battle is fierce and unpredictable, you refuse to yield, fighting with every ounce of strength and resilience. With a decisive strike, you incapacitate the powerful beast, emerging victorious against the odds with his owner nowhere to be seen.

data.name: banditCampUnleashedDog2_6
data.value: With each passing moment, the war dog's relentless onslaught pushes you further and further back, forcing you into a defensive stance as you struggle to fend off its vicious attacks. Despite your best efforts, you find yourself overwhelmed by the relentless assault, unable to gain the upper hand as the battle rages on with no end in sight.

data.name: banditCampVault
data.value: As you scour the chamber for any hidden secrets, your keen eye catches sight of a set of barred doors at the far end of the room. The doors appear impenetrable, their sturdy construction suggesting that they guard something of great value. With a sense of determination, you approach the doors, your fingers tracing the intricate patterns of the bars. Despite your best efforts, the doors refuse to yield, their stubborn resistance a testament to the treasures that lie beyond. Undeterred, you begin to search the surrounding area for any signs of weakness or vulnerability. Your efforts are rewarded when you discover a section of the wall that seems unusually thin, as if it were concealing something hidden from view.

data.name: banditCampVault1_1
data.value: With each strike, the wall begins to give way, crumbling under the relentless assault of your determination. With a final, resounding blow, the weakened barrier collapses, revealing the hidden passage beyond. As the dust settles, you stand victorious amidst the rubble, a triumphant grin spreading across your face. With a sense of satisfaction, you step through the newly opened passage, your heart racing with anticipation at the treasures that lie ahead. With the vault's riches laid out before you like a tantalizing banquet, you waste no time in seizing the opportunity before the guards arrive to investigate the commotion. With lightning speed, you scoop up handfuls of gold coins, jewels, and other precious artifacts, stuffing them into your pack with practiced efficiency.

data.name: banditCampVault1_2
data.value: With each futile blow against the unyielding wall, frustration mounts, and your determination turns to desperation. In a final act of defiance, you summon all your strength for one last mighty strike, but as your fist connects with the unforgiving surface, a searing pain shoots through your arm. With a gasp of agony, you stagger back, clutching your injured limb as a wave of dizziness washes over you. The realization dawns upon you that your efforts have not only been in vain but have also resulted in injury. Grimacing through the pain, you inspect your arm and grimly note the swelling and bruising already starting to form. With each movement, the pain intensifies, a harsh reminder of the consequences of your failed attempt to breach the wall.

data.name: banditCampVault1_3
data.value: With the vault's treasures hastily gathered, you swiftly retreat from the chamber, keenly aware of the impending danger should the guards discover your presence. Each step is deliberate, each movement calculated to minimize noise and maximize speed.

data.name: banditCampVault1_4
data.value: Knowing that further attempts would only exacerbate the injury, you reluctantly concede defeat and retreat from the chamber, nursing your wounded arm and nursing your wounded pride. As you lick your wounds, a sense of frustration gnaws at your resolve, but you vow to return stronger and wiser, determined to find a more effective way to access the vault and claim its riches.

data.name: banditCampVault2_1
data.value: Feeling defeated by the impenetrable barrier, you decide to abandon your attempts to breach the wall. With a heavy heart and aching muscles, you retreat from the chamber, knowing that further attempts would only lead to more frustration and potential injury.

data.name: banditCampVault2_3
data.value: As you leave the vault behind, a sense of disappointment weighs heavily on your mind. The allure of the hidden treasures remains tantalizing, but you know that discretion is the better part of valor in this instance.

data.value: Your character has been saved to clipboard. Now paste it somewhere safe.

data.name: characterSavetToClipboard
data.value: Your character has been saved to clipboard. Paste it somewhere safe.

data.name: defeatPreviousBossText
data.value: You need to defeat the previous dungeon's boss to proceed.

data.name: deleteProgressOption1
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this character? This is irreversible.

data.name: desertBoss
data.value:
As you delve deeper into the labyrinthine passages of the pyramid, your journey culminates in a chamber shrouded in darkness. Suddenly, the silence is shattered by the sound of heavy footsteps echoing ominously through the corridors. With trepidation, you brace yourself as a towering figure emerges from the shadows.
Before you stands the formidable boss of the dungeon: a towering giant mummy, its wrappings adorned with ancient symbols and its eyes glowing with an eerie, otherworldly light. Its presence fills the chamber with a palpable sense of dread, as if the very air itself recoils in fear of this ancient guardian.
As the giant mummy fixates its glowing gaze upon you, you can feel the weight of centuries of slumber and decay bearing down upon you. With each step closer, its imposing figure seems to loom larger, its unearthly presence challenging you to prove your worthiness in the face of its formidable might.

data.name: desertBoss1_1
data.value:
Summoning your courage, you launch yourself into battle against the giant mummy, determined to vanquish this ancient guardian and claim victory over the pyramid's depths. With a primal roar, you charge forward, weapons drawn and adrenaline coursing through your veins.
The clash of steel echoes through the chamber as you engage the towering foe, your strikes landing with ferocity against its weathered form. Despite its imposing stature, you refuse to falter, pressing the attack with unwavering resolve.
With each blow, you chip away at the mummy's defenses, determined to bring an end to its reign of terror. The air crackles with the intensity of the battle as you push yourself to the limits, knowing that victory lies within your grasp if only you can muster the strength to seize it.

data.name: desertBoss1_5
data.value:
With a mighty blow, you bring the giant mummy to its knees, the echoes of your victory reverberating throughout the chamber. As the dust settles, a profound silence descends upon the pyramid, signaling the end of your grand quest.
With the ancient guardian defeated, you stand as a beacon of hope amidst the ancient ruins, your courage and determination shining bright. The weight of your accomplishment settles upon your shoulders, filling you with a sense of fulfillment unlike any other.
As you survey the chamber, a newfound sense of peace washes over you, knowing that your journey through the pyramid's treacherous depths has finally come to an end. With the mysteries of the ancient structure laid bare, you take a moment to savor the fruits of your labor, knowing that your bravery has secured a brighter future for all who dwell in this land.

data.name: desertBoss1_6
data.value:
Despite your valiant efforts, the giant mummy proves to be an insurmountable foe, its ancient power overwhelming you at every turn. As you struggle to land a decisive blow, the mummy's relentless onslaught pushes you to the brink of exhaustion.
With each passing moment, your strength wanes, and the realization dawns upon you that victory may be beyond your grasp. The chamber echoes with the sounds of your futile attempts to overcome the ancient guardian, but alas, your efforts prove fruitless.
As the giant mummy's attacks grow ever more relentless, you find yourself overwhelmed, forced to retreat in the face of certain defeat. With a heavy heart, you concede defeat, knowing that the secrets of the pyramid will remain shrouded in darkness for eternity.

data.name: desertDungeonEntryText
data.value:
After an arduous journey through the scorching desert sands, you finally stumble upon the legendary pyramid, its imposing structure rising majestically against the backdrop of the sun-baked landscape. As you approach, a sense of awe washes over you, mingled with a foreboding sense of unease.
Entering the pyramid, you are immediately enveloped in an eerie atmosphere, as if the very air itself is alive with ancient whispers and unseen forces. The interior seems to shift and warp, playing tricks on your mind and distorting your perception of reality.
With each step deeper into the labyrinthine corridors of the pyramid, you find yourself questioning what is real and what is merely illusion. Shadows dance on the walls, and strange whispers echo in the darkness, leading you ever deeper into the heart of the enigmatic structure.

data.name: dungeonFightLostText
data.value: You lost a fight against your foe. You retreat for now.

data.name: dungeonFightWonText
data.value: You managed to defeat your foe. You move on

data.value: Do you want to leave the dungeon?

data.name: dungeonNoHpLeftText

data.name: dungeonNoStaminaLeft

data.value: fully bypassing armor of the opponent.

data.name: forestBandit
data.value: As you tread cautiously through the dense thicket, the rhythmic sounds of nature are abruptly interrupted by a subtle rustle. Soon, you find yourself face to face with a lone bandit, concealed amidst the shadows of the towering trees. His eyes, sharp and wary, lock onto yours as a tense silence hangs in the air. You both stand in the heart of the thicket, weapons sheathed, each awaiting the other's move. The lone bandit maintains a guarded stance, his eyes never leaving yours. The atmosphere is thick with uncertainty, the dense foliage around you amplifying the tension.

data.name: forestBandit1_1
data.value: You decide to approach the situation with a disarming sincerity, your gaze meeting the bandit's without a hint of hostility. In measured words, you share tales of your journey through the dense forest, emphasizing the challenges faced and the desire for peaceful passage. As you speak, you notice a subtle shift in the bandit's demeanor. The sharp edge of wariness begins to soften, replaced by a cautious intrigue. You exchange informations about this forest but you don't learn anything of massive use unfortunately. After that the bandit steps aside allowing you to move onward.

data.name: forestBandit1_2
data.value: Despite your attempt at a diplomatic approach, the bandit remains unyielding, the skepticism in his eyes deepening. As you weave tales of your journey and peaceful intentions, his expression only hardens. The dense thicket seems to close in as the tension escalates. Without warning, the bandit's hand swiftly moves to draw his weapon, a glint of steel flashing in the shadows.

data.name: forestBandit1_3
data.value: As you walk onward you look back to check on the bandit but already he is out of your sight behind the trees.

data.name: forestBandit1_5
data.value: As the bandit's attack ensues, you react with agility and determination, maneuvering through the tangled undergrowth to outwit your adversary. In the dance of blades beneath the towering trees, your skill prevails. After defeating your opponent you take what you can and move ahead.

data.name: forestBandit1_6
data.value: Bandit proved to be a formidable foe. He severely injures you. Desperate you wait out for his attack and you parry his attack knocking him down. You use the time you recieved to run away.

data.name: forestBandit2_1
data.value: With no intention of diplomacy, you opt for a direct confrontation as the lone bandit stands before you in the dense thicket. Without uttering a word, you swiftly draw your weapon, the glint of steel reflecting the filtered sunlight through the towering trees. The bandit, sensing the shift in the atmosphere, readies himself for the impending clash. The air becomes charged with tension as both of you lock eyes, acknowledging that words have failed to bridge the gap between you.

data.name: forestBandit2_5
data.value: In the end, the lone bandit falls defeated, leaving the dense thicket to witness the aftermath of your unyielding approach. The forest remains indifferent, the echoes of the confrontation lingering as you sheathe your weapon and continue your journey through the towering trees.

data.name: forestBandit2_6
data.value: The forest bears witness to your defeat as the bandit stands victorious. Gasping for breath, you yield to the bandit's dominance, realizing the consequences of your unsuccessful direct approach. With a stern warning, the bandit allows you to retreat, nursing your wounds as you retreat back to the entrance.

data.name: forestBear
data.value: Navigating the dense forest, you unwittingly step into a clearing dominated by a colossal bear. Its fur, a mix of formidable browns and grays, bristles with intensity. The air crackles with tension as the bear fixes its gaze upon you. A low growl rumbles through the clearing, signaling its displeasure at your intrusion. The forest seems to echo the bear's discontent.

data.name: forestBear1_1
data.value: Recognizing that diplomacy and evasion are futile, you prepare to face the angered bear head-on. Drawing your weapon, you brace yourself for a fierce battle, understanding that combat is the only option against this formidable adversary.

data.name: forestBear1_5
data.value: Your combat prowess prevails, and you manage to defeat the angered bear, clearing your path through the forest.

data.name: forestBear1_6
data.value: The bear proves a formidable adversary, and you are forced to retreat.

data.name: forestBoss
data.value: As you approach the heart of the enchanted forest, the colossal gryphon, a majestic and powerful guardian, comes into view. The air crackles with an undeniable tension, and the creature fixates its keen gaze upon you. A formidable challenge lies ahead, and the only way to proceed further is to face the guardian in a direct confrontation.

data.name: forestBoss1_1
data.value: Adopting a combat-ready stance, you prepare to face the Guardian Gryphon head-on. The colossal creature senses your intent, feathers bristling with an aura of ancient power. The clash between mortal and mythical unfolds in the heart of the enchanted grove.

data.name: forestBoss1_5
data.value: Emerging victorious, you overcome the mythical Guardian Gryphon through a combination of skill, strategic choices, and resilience. The enchanted forest yields its secrets as the defeated guardian falls.

data.name: forestBoss1_6
data.value: The clash with the Guardian Gryphon proves to be an arduous challenge, and despite your best efforts, the mythical creature emerges victorious. Its majestic wings beat with a triumphant roar as it inflicts significant wounds upon your character. The enchanted grove bears witness to your valiant struggle, but the battle's outcome necessitates a tactical retreat.

data.name: forestCamp
data.value: As you traverse the dense forest, you stumble upon an unexpected clearing that harbors the remains of an abandoned hunter's camp. Dilapidated tents and scattered belongings suggest a hasty departure. Among the remnants, you notice a cache of spears, weathered but still serviceable. The howls of your hungry stomach remind you that an opportunity for sustenance lies before you.

data.name: forestCamp1_1
data.value: Realizing the usefulness of the spears, you choose to wield them, actively seeking potential prey. It doesn't take long for you to encounter an unsuspecting deer. With practiced skill, you hurl your spear directly into the center of its body, causing the creature to drop almost immediately.

data.name: forestCamp1_2
data.value: Acknowledging the potential utility of the spears, you decide to wield them in pursuit of game. After a thorough search, you come across an unsuspecting deer. However, your attempts to hit the target with the spear prove unsuccessful. Despite finding a deer, the forest yields no other opportunities, leaving you without a successful catch and empty-handed.

data.name: forestCamp1_3
data.value: The camp, now infused with the warmth of both fire and food, offers a momentary respite in the heart of the dense forest. Fueled by the success, you decide to move further into the forest, curious about what lies ahead.

data.name: forestCamp1_4
data.value: The forest's silence is a reminder of the challenges that persist. The flickering flames offer little comfort, and with determination, you decide to move further into the forest, undeterred by the previous setback.

data.name: forestCamp2_1
data.value: Opting for a cautious exploration of the abandoned camp, you meticulously search through the dilapidated tents and scattered belongings. Among the remnants, your keen eyes catch a glimmer beneath a weathered cloak – a small cache of gold coins. Deciding to stay at the camp for a while, you light a campfire, creating a temporary haven amidst the dense forest.

data.name: forestCamp2_3
data.value: Fueled by curiosity and the thrill of discovery, you decide to move further into the forest.

data.name: forestCamp3_1
data.value: You decided to leave the camp alone for now.

data.name: forestCliffside
data.value: As you venture deeper into the forest, the path narrows and leads to a steep cliffside. The only way forward is a precarious traverse along the cliff's edge. The path is rugged, with loose rocks and overhanging branches. Below the cliff thorny vines are awaiting for careless traveler. You consider your options.

data.name: forestCliffside1_1
data.value: Your careful step along the cliffside is successful. You maintain balance, avoid dislodging rocks, and reach the other side without significant physical exertion.

data.name: forestCliffside1_2
data.value: Walking on this thin path proves more challenging than anticipated. Loose rocks create instability, and you struggle to maintain balance. Nearing the end you loose balance and begin to fall. You managed to throw yourself on the end of the cliffside and catch some loose vines. Sharp thorns are digging into your hands and legs badly maiming you and saving your life at once.

data.name: forestCliffside1_3
data.value: Not breaking a sweat you move ahead.

data.name: forestCliffside2_1
data.value: You assess the cliffside, identifying secure points for rigging a makeshift rope or finding natural handholds. You secure yourself with the rope and safely walk through the cliffside.

data.name: forestCliffside2_2
data.value: You assess the cliffside looking for extended branches or rocks. You secure yourself with the rope and walk through the cliffside. But during your passage your rope gets entangled with some roots and you are stuck in the middle of the passage. Your only option is to cut yourself loose and try to get to the end of the cliffside. Not long after that you find yourself falling down but you managed to get a grip on thorny vines. Sharp thorns are digging into your hands and legs badly maiming you and saving your life at once.

data.name: forestCliffside2_3
data.value: You leave the makeshift rope and go on.

data.name: forestCliffside3_1
data.value: You decided to take the safest option to climb over the cliff not risking your life on the cliffside. It is a long and tiring decision but after a dozen of minutes you managed to get on the other side without a scratch.

data.name: forestDeer
data.value: As you navigate the dense forest, you come across a wounded deer. Its injured leg hampers its movement, and the creature seems to be in distress. The deer pauses as it senses your presence, casting a wary gaze in your direction.

data.name: forestDeer1_1
data.value: Using your skills, you carefully and ethically finish the deer, ensuring a swift and humane process. Once the task is complete, you gather necessary materials to cook and prepare the meat. You set up a small campfire to ready the meat.

data.name: forestDeer1_3
data.value: After short rest you move ahead.

data.name: forestDeer2_1
data.value: Employing your resourcefulness, you fashion a simple, functional splint for the deer's injured leg using available materials. The wounded deer, cautious but appreciative, allows you to provide the necessary aid. With the makeshift splint in place, the creature acknowledges your resourcefulness. Your actions not only help the deer but also you learn something from this encounter.

data.name: forestDeer2_3
data.value: Watching the deer disappearing into the woods you march on.

data.name: forestDeer3_1
data.value: The creature's injuries suggest recent aggression, and a subtle awareness creeps over you—an inkling that whatever maimed the deer might still be in the vicinity. Sensing potential danger, you choose a cautious retreat, leaving the wounded deer to face its challenges while prioritizing your own safety.

data.name: forestDeer3_3
data.value: Swiftly you leave the area following the path further.

data.name: forestDungeonEntryText
data.value: Following the path you go deep into the forest. Trees around you are becoming more dense second by second. After a few minutes you are engulfed almost completely by darkness. Forest became so thick that you are only able to follow the path. Spiky vines are between the trees and unholy growls are heard within them. After not a long while you found an archway made of stones with runes on it.

data.name: forestMiniBoss
data.value: As you traverse the dense forest, a primal presence stirs nearby. Emerging from the shadows, the alpha wolf reveals itself—a magnificent creature, its fur aglow with an aura of dominance. The air crackles with tension as the alpha's piercing gaze fixes upon you, acknowledging your presence with a mixture of curiosity and challenge.

data.name: forestMiniBoss1_1
data.value: With a primal roar that echoes through the forest, the alpha wolf launches itself forward in a lightning-fast charge. Muscles ripple beneath its fur as it hurtles toward you with relentless speed, jaws agape and fangs gleaming in the dappled sunlight.

data.name: forestMiniBoss1_5
data.value: In this triumphant victory, you emerge as the dominant force in the confrontation with the alpha wolf, your skill and determination proving superior to the creature's brute strength. The forest echoes with the sounds of your triumph as you assert your place at the top of the food chain, leaving the defeated alpha wolf to lick its wounds and acknowledge your dominance.

data.name: forestMiniBoss1_6
data.value: In this harrowing defeat, the alpha wolf asserts its dominance with brutal efficiency, leaving you battered and broken beneath its formidable might. The forest creatures witness to your valiant but ultimately futile stand against the alpha's unrelenting aggression.

data.name: forestMiniBoss2_1
data.value: Sensing the overwhelming power of the alpha wolf's charge, you make a split-second decision to prioritize survival over confrontation. With adrenaline coursing through your veins, you pivot on your heel and sprint away from the oncoming predator, heart pounding in your chest as you flee deeper into the dense undergrowth of the forest.

data.name: forestMiniBoss2_3
data.value: Your swift retreat proves to be your saving grace as you outpace the alpha wolf's pursuit, leaving the creature's territory behind in your desperate bid for safety. With every step, you put more distance between yourself and the formidable predator, the adrenaline-fueled rush of escape propelling you onward.

data.name: forestMutatedBoar
data.value: As you delve deeper into the dense forest, you encounter a vast swamp blocking your path. The air is thick with humidity, and the swamp waters appear murky and foreboding. The choices before you demand consideration.

data.name: forestMutatedBoar1_1
data.value: You move through the swamp. Contaminated waters reach to your waist. You noticed something moving in the vines between the trees but now you must push onward. Finally you came out the swamp but from the vines strange boar charges you.

data.name: forestMutatedBoar1_5
data.value: You managed to defeat the boar. You don't want to linger around his corpse for long before the rest of his potential herd arrives.

data.name: forestMutatedBoar1_6
data.value: The boar managed to hold you long enough for his herd to join him. Outnumbered you are forced to retreat.

data.name: forestMutatedBoar2
data.value: Move around the swamp between the vines (Agility)

data.name: forestMutatedBoar2_1
data.value: You managed to carefully move between the sharp thorns of the vines. Swiftly and silently you move around the swamp.

data.name: forestMutatedBoar2_2
data.value: You tried to move carefully between the vines but unfortunatelly you were badly cut by the thorns.

data.name: forestMutatedBoar2_3
data.value: Swiftly and silently you move onward.

data.name: forestRiver
data.value: Confronted by a relentless and tumultuous river, you stand at the water's edge, contemplating your options. The current is swift and unforgiving, presenting a formidable challenge. As you assess the situation, two choices came to mind.

data.name: forestRiver1_1
data.value: With unwavering determination, you decide to swim directly against the powerful current, relying on your physical strength to forge through the relentless torrent. That was indeed a hard feat but you managed to safely get across the river.

data.name: forestRiver1_2
data.value: With determination you decided to swim directly through the powerful current. Not long after you started to regret it. Current is so strong that you barely can keep yourself afloat. You are thrown against the rocks on the other rivreside. Bruised you get out of the river a little dissapointed in your strength.

data.name: forestRiver1_3
data.value: Flexing your muscles you go ahead.

data.name: forestRiver1_4
data.value: After checking your body for wounds you go ahead.

data.name: forestRiver2
data.value: Wait for the current to subside.

data.name: forestRiver2_1
data.value: Opting for a more cautious approach, you decide to patiently observe the river's flow, waiting for a potential lull or change in current before attempting a crossing. After couple of hours the current calms allowing you to cross safely.

data.name: forestRuins
data.value: Moving through the thicket you found an old ruins. You step inside. There is a lot of rubble and rotten furniture. After checking the ruins it appears to be an old lumberjack's cottage.

data.name: forestRuins1_1
data.value: Searching through the rubble you have found an old sack with some treasure in it.

data.name: forestRuins1_2
data.value: You searched through the whole ruined cottage but you did not find anything of a value.

data.name: forestRuins1_3
data.value: With a few more coins in your sack you go on.

data.name: forestRuins2_1
data.value: You decided to rest for a few minutes. Calm atmosphere allowed your body to relax for a while. Soon after you that growls and rustle noises were getting louder. Not spotting direct danger your unease was growing in you. As you swiftly left the ruins noises subsided lefting you alone in the dark forest.

data.name: forestRuins2_3
data.value: Trying not to think about it you move ahead.

data.name: forestRuins3_1
data.value: You decided to leave the ruins alone for now.

data.name: forestStagecoach
data.value: Your exploration through the dense forest leads you to a startling sight—an overturned stagecoach, its once ornate exterior now marred by dirt and leaves. The vehicle lies at an odd angle, a victim of some past calamity. As you inspect the scene more closely, you realize that a strategically placed tree now blocks the entrance, as if intentionally used to halt the coach's progress.

data.name: forestStagecoach1_1
data.value: You decide to use your strength to remove the obstructing tree. Muscles tense, you position yourself to exert raw power, attempting to clear the path through sheer force. Your forceful approach moves the obstructing tree, exposing the entranced stagecoach and with it some long forgotten valuables.

data.name: forestStagecoach1_2
data.value: As you strain against the weight of the tree, it becomes apparent that the task is more formidable than you initially estimated. Despite your efforts, the tree proves unyielding. The limbs resist your attempts to lift them, leaving you struggling with the weight. Beads of sweat form on your forehead as fatigue sets in, but the tree remains firmly in place, blocking access to the entranced stagecoach.

data.name: forestStagecoach1_3
data.value: With sacks filled with coin you march on.

data.name: forestStagecoach1_4
data.value: Tired and somewhat dissapointed you move on.

data.name: forestStagecoach2_1
data.value: Upon assessing the obstacle before you, you make a deliberate decision to abstain from attempting to lift the tree that blocks the entrance to the entranced stagecoach.

data.name: forestStagecoach2_3
data.value: Leaving the obstructing tree undisturbed, you step back from the scene and follow the path further.

data.name: forestWolf
data.value: The dense forest becomes eerily silent as you tread along a narrow path. Suddenly, a chorus of haunting howls pierces the silence, signaling an imminent threat. Shadows dance among the trees, and a pack of hungry wolves emerges from the darkness, their eyes gleaming with predatory intent.

data.name: forestWolf1_1
data.value: Ready for combat, you decide to face the wolf pack head-on, adopting a defensive stance. One of them decides to lunge towards you. Your weapon at the ready, you prepare to fend off the attacker.

data.name: forestWolf1_5
data.value: Your defensive maneuvers prove effective, defeating the wolf scared the rest of them driving the wolves back temporarily. Not wanting to let them come back you march on.

data.name: forestWolf1_6
data.value: Your defensive maneuvers prove difficult to maintain. Wolf manages to bypass your defenses and badly maim you. With the lasts of your strength you miracously managed to escape from the wolf pack.
