data.value: Reach level 10. Reward : Mountains expedition unlocked!

data.name: goals14
data.value: Reach level 14. Reward : Blue rarity items are now showing!

data.name: goals15
data.value: Reach level 15 and defeat granary cellar dungeon boss. Reward: Deep forest dungeon available!

data.name: goals20
data.value: Reach level 20. Reward : Bandit camp expedition unlocked!

data.name: goals21
data.value: Reach level 21. Reward : Violet rarity items are now showing!

data.name: goals25
data.value: Reach level 25 and defeat deep forest dungeon boss. Reward : Mountain's cave dungeon available!

data.name: goals28
data.value: Reach level 28. Reward : Orange rarity items are now showing!

data.name: goals30
data.value: Reach level 30. Reward : Desert expedition unlocked!

data.name: goals30_1
data.value: Reach level 30 and defeat mountain's cave boss. Reward : Bandit stronghold available!

data.name: goals35
data.value: Reach level 35 and defeat bandit stronghold boss. Reward : Pyramid dungeon available!

data.name: goals35_1
data.value: Reach level 35. Reward : Red rarity items are now showing!

data.name: goals5
data.value: Reach level 5. Reward : Granary cellar dungeon available! Forest expedition unlocked!

data.name: goals7
data.value: Reach level 7. Reward : Green rarity items are now showing!

data.name: goalsAllDone
data.value:
Wow. I did not think anyone would be able to finish this game because of how simple it is. Anyway thanks for pulling yourself through everything that my first "proper" game I ever made has to offer ;) I probably won't update this game further apart from maybe bugfixing so feel free to go on adventure in different games. I hope to see you again in my future game releases hopefully more ambitious than this. Best wishes to you my friend!
Thanks for playing!
Fell free to leave a comment on google play store page :)

data.name: goalsArenaColliseum
data.value: Defeat the legend of the arena! (Same level or above)

data.name: goalsArenaEasy
data.value: Defeat your first enemy from arena!

data.name: goalsArenaHard
data.value: Defeat formidable opponent from arena! (Same level or above)

data.name: goalsArenaMedium
data.value: Defeat moderate enemy from arena! (Same level or above)

data.name: granaryBoss
data.value: You feel like you are reaching the end of the granary's cellar. In front of you instead of a corridor leading to another chamber you are presented with destroyed wall with a passage to an underground cave. You check your surroundings and can not find any other way forward so you get ready and move in. Almost immediately you are engulfed in horrible stench even worse than before. Not long after you enter a somewhat big opening. With your torch up you see a lot of vermin running away from you. For sure it's the nest of them. You see that the base of this cave is packed with flammable things like grain, feces and some kind of dried up vegetation. While you were getting ready your other torch to light the nest up you can hear a roar from other part of this cave. After not a long while you hear many heavy footsteps and squealing of stomped rats with them. In front of your eyes presents a horrible being, Rat King. Gigantic creature with the size similar to a bear, maybe even bigger. You are horrified by this monstrosity but you don't even have a chance to retreat before it charges you head on.

data.name: granaryBoss1_1
data.value: You throw your torch into this horrible being to slow this monster down and get ready your weapon. Mustering every bit of your strength with a battle cry you charge the Rat King.

data.name: granaryBoss1_5
data.value: WIth a hard fought battle you emerge victorious from your engagement. Defeated Rat King lies in front of you motionless. After quick looting you set ablaze the nest and march back to the city.

data.name: granaryBoss1_6
data.value: The monstrosity quickly overpowers you. During your pitiful try to kill the Rat King his fangs sinks into your shoulder and then flings you back to the entrance. With your broken arms barely gripping your weapon you retreat back. Terrified you sprint back to the entrance after which you pass out from exhaustion.

data.name: granaryClosedChest
data.value: You encounter a dusty old wooden chest forgotten in a corner of chamber you currently are in.

data.name: granaryClosedChest1_1
data.value: With a satisfying click, the lock yields to your efforts, allowing the lid of the chest to creak open slowly, revealing the treasures hidden within its depths.

data.name: granaryClosedChest1_2
data.value: Despite your persistent efforts, the lock finally succumbs to the strain, breaking with a resounding snap, rendering the chest's contents forever inaccessible.

data.name: granaryClosedChest1_4
data.value: Tired and frustrated you move on.

data.name: granaryClosedChest2_1
data.value: With a resolute determination, you bring down a mighty blow upon the chest, its weakened frame yielding easily to your strength. Splinters fly as the wood shatters beneath the force of your assault, revealing the long-hidden contents within with surprising ease.

data.name: granaryClosedChest2_2
data.value: Despite exerting all your strength, the chest remains stubbornly intact, unfazed by your relentless assault. Sharp waves of pain shoot through your arms, a sobering reminder of your limits. Recognizing the futility of further attempts, you begrudgingly concede defeat, withdrawing from the futile endeavor for the time being.

data.name: granaryClosedChest2_3
data.value: Armed with the spoils of your efforts, you press onward into the unknown depths.

data.name: granaryClosedChest2_4
data.value: After one last desperate kick you move on.

data.name: granaryClosedChest3_1
data.value: Accepting the defeat with a begrudging sigh, you opt to leave the stubborn chest behind for now, its secrets tantalizingly out of reach. With a resigned shrug, you continue your journey into the depths, the mystery of the chest lingering in the back of your mind as you venture further into the unknown.

data.name: granaryDamagedCrates
data.value: On your way you found a small compartment with damaged wooden crates in it.

data.name: granaryDamagedCrates1_1
data.value: You found some gold laying around.

data.name: granaryDamagedCrates1_3
data.value: With a few more coins to spend you move on.

data.name: granaryDamagedCrates2_1
data.value: You found a loaf of barely edible bread.

data.name: granaryDamagedCrates2_3
data.value: Sated for now you move forward.

data.name: granaryDamagedCrates3_1
data.value: You decided to leave the crates for now.

data.name: granaryDungeonEntryText
data.value: As you open the heavy granary doors, you look for a hatch leading to the long-forgotten cellar below. The air is thick with spoiled grain and animal filth. As you step further into the dark, worn wood creaks under your weight. After a while, your eyes grew accustomed to the darkness, allowing you to see further. You found a worn olive lamp with a few drops of fuel in it. Using the lamp it doesn't take long for you to locate the hatch hidden under the rotten hay pile. As you swing it open, a putrid stench of decaying flesh washes over you, nearly causing you to retch. You prepare your torch and, with a hopeful glance at the ladder, begin your descent, praying that it will hold your weight in the depths below.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave
data.value: Walking through the cellar you hear faint footsteps from ahead. You hide in the dark waiting for what comes next. After couple of minutes you see a human shape closing in to your position. Bare foot, wearing rags and holding a club in his right hand you clearly see that it is an escaped slave. Looking at him you spot a mark of death on his cheek. He probably escaped an execution and hid in here. You contemplate how to dispose of him.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave1_1
data.value: You decided its best to just eliminate potential threat here and now. You wait for him to pass you and attack from rear.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave1_5
data.value: Easily you defeated potential threat. Kind of dissapointed that he didn't had anything of value with him you leave.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave1_6
data.value: You get suprised by his reaction and fighting skills. He beats you with ease and runs away from you. Severely hurt you retreat to the entrance.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave2_1
data.value: You hide your weapon behind your back and approach him. From safe distance you welcome him. Startled he does not respond to you and takes an aggressive stance. You try to calm him down assuring him that you are not sent after him, you just want to help him. He eases up a bit and walks towards you. You put some bread you took with you on this expedition on the floor and he launches for it. Seeing that now he is now completely defenseless you quickly grab your weapon and strike him down. He didn't even knew what happened.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave2_2
data.value: You hide your weapon behind your back and approach him. From safe distance you welcome him. Startled he does not respond to you and takes an aggressive stance. You try to calm him down assuring him that you are not sent after him, but he does not look like he is listening to you. He charges you with his club. You don't even had a chance to grab your weapon before his club striked your skull. You lost your conciusness. When you woke up there was no sign of this slave. After checking your equipment you are calmed down by a fact that he didn't took anything from you. You are lucky that you are still alive.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave2_3
data.value: Feeling no remorse you leave his body and pass on.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave2_4
data.value: With a mild headache you go on.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave3_1
data.value: You decided it's best to let him pass. Who knows why was he sentenced to death and you don't want to test your luck with him since he is still alive down here. You are quietly waiting for him to move past you.

data.name: granaryEscapedSlave3_3
data.value: After a couple of minutes and not hearing footsteps you go ahead.

data.name: granaryHugeSpider
data.value: Moving through the heavy webbed corridor you find a big chamber filled with eggs and cobwebs. You bring your torch highet to illuminate a whole room and you see a huge spider in the corner of the room. It has not sensed you yet. You quickly hid behind some destroyed crates and observe it for a while. The beast is so huge that you probably can just ignore it and move to the next part of the underground. But on the other hand you clearly saw something flashy there too. Maybe it would be worth to kill it and take it's loot?

data.name: granaryHugeSpider1_1
data.value: Your greed is not letting you leave without the gold just laying there. You charge the monster.

data.name: granaryHugeSpider1_5
data.value: You defeated the beast! Taking all the gold and a new story to tell you move ahead.

data.name: granaryHugeSpider1_6
data.value: The beast with his mighty attack throws you across the whole room to the wall. You lost conciousness for a second and gasp for air. Seeing the beast slowly approaching you you get terrified and you try to crawl out of this cursed place. Monster shrieks at you but it can't get to you because of his size. Barely alive you slowly crawl back to the entrance.

data.name: granaryHugeSpider2_1
data.value: You decided it is not worth sacrificing your life trying to beat a beast three times bigger than you.

data.name: granaryHugeSpider2_3
data.value: Somewhat intrigued by a monstrosity you move on

data.name: granaryOldBrew
data.value: You entered a small room that look like someones sleeping quarter. It does not look better than the rest of the cellar but something catches your eye. You spot a sealed bottle of some substance. You can clearly see that it is some old brew.

data.name: granaryOldBrew1_1
data.value: Pungent liquid pours down your throat. At first it burns your insides, but then respite comes with it. You feel refreshed and ready to push on.

data.name: granaryOldBrew1_2
data.value: Pungent liquid pours down your throat. At first it burns your insides and soon after your stomach rejects its contents. After a few minutes of vomiting you start to feel dizzy and tired. You realize it wasn't so great idea to drink an unknown liquid from gods know where.

data.name: granaryOldBrew1_3
data.value: Like newborn you are ready for what awaits.

data.name: granaryOldBrew1_4
data.value: Contemplating your life choices you go on.

data.name: granaryOldBrew2
data.value: Take it and sell it later

data.name: granaryOldBrew2_1
data.value: You aren't too keen to drink unknown substance just laying here for gods know how long, but maybe someone back in the city might want to buy it.

data.name: granaryOldBrew2_3
data.value: Without much thought about it you go on.

data.name: granaryOldBrew3_1
data.value: You decided to leave it for now

data.name: granaryOldDocuments
data.value: You entered a relatively small room with your weapon and torch up. With a sigh of relief you did not spot any danger awaiting for you. Instead it looks like you are in some small document storage room.

data.name: granaryOldDocuments1
data.value: Look for not yet outdated documents (Intelligence)

data.name: granaryOldDocuments1_1
data.value: You have found some documents about ownership of fields nearby. You know it is worth something!

data.name: granaryOldDocuments1_2
data.value: You waste a lot of time searching through every documents there is but unluckily you found nothing of worth.

data.name: granaryOldDocuments1_3
data.value: Trying to remember where you could pawn it you move forward.

data.name: granaryOldDocuments1_4
data.value: Frustrated you tear the documents you were holding and leave the room.

data.name: granaryOldDocuments2_1
data.value: You decided that probably these old papers aren't worth anything and make use of them by making a small campfire to rest a bit.

data.name: granaryOldDocuments2_3
data.value: After warming up a bit you get ready to move ahead.

data.name: granaryOldDocuments3_1
data.value: You decided it is not the best time to look through these documents and leave quickly before being noticed by the beasts.

data.name: granaryOldDocuments3_3
data.value: Noting to yourself a whereabouts of this place you move on.

data.name: granaryRatBlockade
data.value: As you delve into the subterranean depths, a looming figure halts your progress—a monstrous rat barring your path. Initially mistaken for a hulking canine due to its sheer size, the creature emits a sinister hiss, poised to unleash its fury upon you.

data.name: granaryRatBlockade1_1
data.value: There is no other way than to defeat this threat. You ready your weapon and charge the rat.

data.name: granaryRatBlockade1_5
data.value: Having dispatched your foe effortlessly, you press forward, the lingering sense of danger urging you onward through the oppressive darkness below.

data.name: granaryRatBlockade1_6
data.value: The rat proved a formidable adversary, leaving you grievously wounded and compelled to retreat in defeat, the sting of failure gnawing at your resolve as you reluctantly withdraw to nurse your wounds.

data.name: granaryRatPack
data.value: Before you, a horde of rats blocks your path, a writhing mass of fur and malice, their beady eyes gleaming with a hunger for blood.

data.name: granaryRatPack1_1
data.value: You decided to take them out.

data.name: granaryRatPack1_5
data.value: You managed to thin out the numbers of rats for them to scatter and clear out the way. Using this clearing you speed past them.

data.name: granaryRatPack1_6
data.value: Rats overran you. Badly bit and bleeding you retreat back to the entrance.

data.name: granaryRatPack2
data.value: Try to startle them away using torch (Dexterity)

data.name: granaryRatPack2_1
data.value: Skillfully you managed to slowly move through agressive vermin. With excellent maneuvering your torch you scare them away.

data.name: granaryRatPack2_2
data.value: Vermin does not care for your cheap trick. Groups of rats lash out to you bitting your legs in process. You try to defend yourself.

data.name: granaryRatPack2_3
data.value: Slightly shaken from disgust you quickly march forward.

data.name: granaryRatPack2_5
data.value: You were badly bit, but you managed to thin out the numbers enough for you to slip through.

data.name: granaryRatPack2_6
data.value: From every side rats attack you mangling your lower limbs. With the last of your strength you managed to retreat to the entrance.

data.name: granaryRatPack3
data.value: Try to avoid them and carry on (Agility)

data.name: granaryRatPack3_1
data.value: You tried to lure away the pests by throwing moldy grain you found in damaged bags nearby. They fell for it and you slowly sneaked past them.

data.name: granaryRatPack3_2
data.value: You tried to lure away the pests by throwing moldy grain you found in damaged bags. They fell for it but your clumsiness revealed your presence. Most of them ignored your decoy and attacked you while you tried to go past them.

data.name: granaryRatPack3_3
data.value: For a while you wonder how would it end if not for your sneaking skills. Quickly you ignore these thoughts and move on.

data.name: granaryRatPack3_5
data.value: Surprised by the attack you dispatch a few rats and run ahead before the rest notices you.

data.name: granaryRatPack3_6
data.value: You are quickly overran by the rats, badly bit you decided it's time to retreat back.

data.name: granaryTrappedCorridor
data.value: While delving the underground you instinctively stop the moment you saw a suspicious corridor with corpses laying in the sides of it. You see bloody spots on the walls indicating that this corridor is trapped. Investigating corpses from safe distance you can spot broken bones sticking out from the limbs of the victims.

data.name: granaryTrappedCorridor1_1
data.value: You found a simple mechanism of pressure plates on the floor. Skillfully you threw some bricks loose from the walls on them and activate every trap. Big bags fell from the ceiling and from behind the columns thudding against the walls. Carefully you walk through and leave the area unscathed.

data.name: granaryTrappedCorridor1_2
data.value: You found a simple mechanism of pressure plates on the floor. You threw some bricks loose from the walls on them and activate every trap. At least you thought that happened. Big bags fell from the ceiling in front of you. Thinking it was over you tried to walk through traps. Your heart skipped a beat when being in the middle of the corridor your foot sank a bit into the floor. Hearing some mechanism that took place you tried to escape from the danger zone but you still got hit by a one huge bag in the ribs. You get knocked out of other traps but still it hurts like hell. At least you are alive.

data.name: granaryTrappedCorridor1_3
data.value: You don't even want to think how it would end without your sharp eyes.

data.name: granaryTrappedCorridor1_4
data.value: You count your broken ribs and move ahead.

data.name: granaryTrappedCorridor2_1
data.value: You decided to move through the corridor. After a few steps your foot sinks a bit into a floor. You hear and then see big bags falling from the ceiling but you fortunately dodge them. Unfortunately though your foot sinks again. Expecting something falling from the ceiling you look up but you hear cogs moving in the walls. You brace getting ready to get hit. After couple of seconds you get hit from the side by a bag but you managed to withstand its power. A while passes and the cogs stopped moving. You move through fallen bags and leave the danger zone mostly unscathed.

data.name: granaryTrappedCorridor2_2
data.value: You decided to move through the corridor. After a few steps your foot sinks a bit into a floor. You hear and then see a big bag falling from the ceiling. You try to move away from the danger but you are too slow and you get hit by it in the back propelling you ahead. You fall on your knees and arms activating another trap. You don't event have a moment to try to avoid it and you get hit from the side. You wait for a bit for it to end and after a while it gets quiet. Moving through you are waiting for another trap but fortunately that was it. You got some bruises but you will live.

data.name: granaryTrappedCorridor2_3
data.value: Holding your hit side you go on.

data.name: granaryTrappedCorridor2_4
data.value: After resting a bit you go on.

data.name: importOption3
data.value: Are you sure you want to import this character? It will override your current one.

data.name: importTextboxText
data.value: Input your saved json text here

data.name: informationsDungeons
data.value: Enter a dungeon and try to beat a randomly generated expedition with choices to make. You will use your base stat value for tests and remember to have as much stamina as possible. Almost every action requires an action point which is set at the start from your current stamina.

data.name: informationsExpeditions
data.value: Embark on expedition to earn gold and experience. If you are struggling to win a fight then you may need to go on easier expeditions to earn more gold and strengthen yourself.

data.name: informationsShop
data.value: Spend your gold on various items refreshed every hour. No refunds!

data.name: informationsWork
data.value: Here you can earn money by working your set time. During work you cannot go to an expedition or a dungeon, but you can still visit other places and fight on the arena, after all you are a gladiator. Also you can do a quick work or quick train to spend your remaining stamina to instantly gain gold or experience.

data.name: insufficientMaxStaminaMessage
data.value: You need to increase your maximum stamina in order to train further.

data.name: itemGoldText
data.comment: było gold, zmienione na ikonke monety

data.name: levelTooLow
data.value: Your level is too low for this item to equip.

data.name: levelUp25Info
data.value: New expedition! Bandit's base New dungeon! Mountain's cave

data.name: levelUp30Info
data.value: New expedition! Desert New dungeon! Bandit Stronghold

data.name: levelUp5Info
data.value: New expedition! Dim Forest New Dungeon! Granary's cellar

data.name: levelUpText2
data.value: Your stamina and health have been replenished and you are awarded with

data.name: mountainsBandit
data.value: As you cautiously navigate the dim corridors of the dungeon, your senses alert for any signs of danger, you suddenly stumble upon a lurking bandit, caught off guard by your presence. With a startled shout, the bandit whirls around to face you, brandishing a wicked-looking blade with malicious intent.

data.name: mountainsBandit1_1
data.value: Caught in the heat of the moment, the bandit wastes no time in launching a frenzied attack, his movements swift and vicious as he lunges forward with deadly precision. Adrenaline courses through your veins as you brace yourself for the onslaught, your instincts screaming at you to defend yourself against the imminent threat.

data.name: mountainsBandit1_3
data.value: As the bandit's assault weakens, you capitalize on the opening, landing a decisive blow that sends him staggering backward. With a relentless barrage of strikes, you press the advantage, each blow bringing you closer to victory. Finally, with a final, resounding strike, you bring the bandit to his knees, victorious in the face of adversity.

data.name: mountainsBandit1_4
data.value: Despite your best efforts, the bandit's relentless onslaught proves too much to handle. With each strike, your defenses crumble, and the bandit's blows find their mark with devastating accuracy. As the battle wears on, fatigue sets in, sapping your strength and resolve.

data.name: mountainsBandit1_5
data.value: With a weary but satisfied sigh, you stand over the fallen foe, the echoes of battle slowly fading as you gather your resolve and press onward through the dungeon's depths.

data.name: mountainsBandit1_6
data.value: With a final, decisive blow, the bandit sends you crashing to the ground, your weapon slipping from your grasp as darkness closes in around you. As consciousness fades, the sound of the bandit's mocking laughter echoes in your ears, a bitter reminder of your defeat in the face of overwhelming odds.

data.name: mountainsBoss
data.value:
As you delve deeper into the mountain's cavernous depths, your footsteps echoing softly against the cold stone floor, you suddenly come face-to-face with a towering behemoth—the boss of the cave, a massive monster of immense proportions.
Its colossal form fills the chamber, casting a menacing shadow that looms over you like a dark omen. With each labored breath, the creature's muscles ripple with power, and its eyes gleam with a primal ferocity that sends a shiver down your spine.
With a deafening roar that reverberates off the cavern walls, the monster lashes out, its massive claws slashing through the air with deadly intent. You stand your ground, heart pounding with a mix of fear and determination as you prepare to face this formidable foe.

data.name: mountainsBoss1_1
data.value:
With every ounce of strength and skill you possess, you launch into battle against the monstrous creature, each blow delivered with unwavering resolve as you strive to overcome the ultimate challenge that lies before you.
As the battle rages on, the cavern echoes with the sounds of combat, the clash of metal and the monster's enraged roars filling the air with a cacophony of chaos. With each passing moment, the stakes grow higher, and the outcome of the struggle hangs in the balance as you fight tooth and nail for your very survival.

data.name: mountainsBoss1_5
data.value:
Finally, with a decisive strike, you deliver the finishing blow that brings the monstrous beast to its knees. With a deafening roar, the creature collapses to the ground, defeated and vanquished by your unwavering determination and skill.
As the echoes of battle fade into the darkness, you stand victorious over the fallen monster, your heart pounding with the thrill of conquest. With a sense of pride and accomplishment, you know that you have overcome the ultimate challenge and emerged victorious in the heart of the mountain's cave.

data.name: mountainsBoss1_6
data.value:
Battle rages on, your movements grow sluggish, your muscles aching with exhaustion as you struggle to keep pace with the monster's relentless onslaught. With each passing moment, your hope of victory fades, replaced by a sinking feeling of dread as you realize the inevitable outcome of the battle.
With a final, bone-crushing blow, the monster delivers the finishing strike that sends you crashing to the ground in defeat. As consciousness slips away, the echoes of its triumphant roars ring in your ears, a bitter reminder of your failure to overcome the monstrous foe that lurks within the depths of the mountain's cave.

data.name: mountainsDeadAdventurer
data.value: As you delve deeper into the labyrinthine passages of the mountain's caves, the air grows heavy with the scent of damp earth and ancient stone. The flickering light of your torch casts eerie shadows on the rough-hewn walls, revealing glimpses of forgotten corridors and hidden alcoves. Suddenly, your footsteps come to an abrupt halt as your torchlight illuminates a grisly sight—a fallen adventurer lying crumpled on the rocky floor. Their armor is battered and torn, stained with the telltale signs of a fierce struggle. A sense of solemnity settles over you as you approach the fallen figure, the weight of their untold story hanging heavy in the air.

data.name: mountainsDeadAdventurer1_1
data.value: Kneeling beside the fallen adventurer, you carefully inspect their belongings, searching for any clues to unravel the mystery of their demise. A weathered map clutched tightly in their hand offers a glimpse into their journey, while a bloodstained journal nearby hints at the trials they faced in these treacherous depths.

data.name: mountainsDeadAdventurer1_3
data.value: Though their journey has come to a tragic end, you can't help but feel a sense of kinship with the fallen adventurer—a fellow seeker of fortune and glory in the face of overwhelming odds. With a silent vow to honor their memory, you press on, determined to uncover the secrets hidden within the mountain's unforgiving embrace.

data.name: mountainsDeadAdventurer2_1
data.value: As you stand beside the fallen adventurer, a sense of reverence washes over you, acknowledging the weight of their journey and the trials they faced in these unforgiving depths. With a solemn nod, you realize that now is not the time to dwell on their fate but to press forward in your own quest.

data.name: mountainsDeadAdventurer2_3
data.value: Gently laying a hand on the adventurer's still form, you offer a silent farewell, a wordless acknowledgment of their courage and determination. Though their journey has ended, yours continues, and you must honor their sacrifice by forging ahead.

data.name: mountainsDungeonEntryText
data.value:
Wandering through the rugged terrain at the foot of the looming mountains, you stumble upon a narrow crevice in the rock face. As you draw closer, a chill crawls down your spine, and a sense of foreboding settles over you like a shroud. The entrance to the cave exudes an aura of darkness, its yawning mouth seeming to swallow the feeble rays of sunlight that dare to penetrate its depths.
Strange, otherworldly noises emanate from within, echoing eerily off the jagged walls of the cavern. A cacophony of whispers and murmurs, punctuated by occasional unsettling groans, fills the air, sending shivers down your spine. It's as if the very earth itself is alive with a malevolent energy, warning you of the perils that lie ahead. lurk within.

data.name: mountainsGoldVein
data.value: As you continue your exploration through the winding tunnels of the mountain's depths, your senses keenly attuned to every sound and shadow, a glimmer catches your eye. Drawing closer, you realize with a thrill that you've stumbled upon a vein of shimmering gold embedded within the rocky walls.

data.name: mountainsGoldVein1_1
data.value: Each strike of your pickaxe brings you closer to your goal, the rhythmic sound echoing through the caverns as you delve deeper into the heart of the mountain. Sweat beads on your brow, and your muscles ache with exertion, but the promise of riches spurs you onward. Finally, after hours of tireless labor, you unearth the last nugget of gold, its gleaming surface a testament to your perseverance and skill. With a triumphant grin, you gather the fruits of your labor, marveling at the weight of the precious metal in your hands.

data.name: mountainsGoldVein1_2
data.value: As you dig deeper into the rocky walls, you soon realize that extracting the gold will be no easy feat. The rock proves stubborn and unyielding, resisting your efforts with every strike of your pickaxe. Despite your best efforts, progress is slow, and frustration begins to gnaw at the edges of your resolve. Just when you feel on the verge of success, disaster strikes—a sudden collapse sends cascades of rock tumbling down around you, burying the vein. Coughing and sputtering in the dust-choked air, you realize with a sinking heart that your attempt to mine the gold has ended in failure.

data.name: mountainsGoldVein1_3
data.value: With the golden treasure safely in your possession, you pack your things, ready to further to face whatever challenges lie ahead.

data.name: mountainsGoldVein1_4
data.value: Dissapointed you get up and go further beyond.

data.name: mountainsGoldVein2_1
data.value: Standing before the gleaming vein of gold, you feel a surge of excitement at the prospect of claiming such wealth for yourself. However, as you consider the risks and challenges involved in mining the vein, a sense of caution begins to gnaw at the edges of your resolve. With a sigh, you realize that attempting to mine the gold now would be a reckless endeavor—one that could end in disaster. Though the promise of riches is alluring, you know that patience and careful planning are essential if you are to succeed.

data.name: mountainsGoldVein2_3
data.value: Turning away from the vein, you continue your exploration of the caverns, the promise of untold riches still burning brightly in your mind.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer
data.value: As you navigate the winding corridors of the dungeon, your senses alert for any signs of danger, you stumble upon a lone figure huddled in a shadowy alcove—a lost adventurer, his eyes wild with a haunted intensity that speaks of untold horrors endured. Approaching cautiously, you offer a word of greeting, your voice soft and soothing in an attempt to calm the adventurer's frayed nerves. His gaze locks onto yours with a mixture of suspicion and desperation, his mind seemingly lost in the depths of madness.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer1_1
data.value: Approaching the mad adventurer cautiously, you extend a calming hand, your voice soft and reassuring as you speak soothing words of comfort. Despite the turmoil raging within him, your gentle demeanor begins to chip away at the walls of his madness, the intensity in his eyes gradually giving way to a glimmer of clarity. As you continue to offer reassurance and empathy, the mad adventurer gradually begins to relax, the frenzied energy that once consumed him fading into a sense of peace and clarity. With a grateful smile, he nods in appreciation, his eyes reflecting a newfound sense of calm.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer1_2
data.value: Despite your best efforts to calm the mad adventurer, his frenzied state only seems to intensify, his wild eyes darting about in a maelstrom of paranoia and fear. With each attempt to offer reassurance, his agitation grows, his voice rising to a fevered pitch as he lashes out with accusations and wild gestures. As the tension mounts, you find yourself caught in the grip of his madness, your attempts to reason with him falling on deaf ears. With a sudden, unexpected lurch, the adventurer lunges forward, his movements erratic and unpredictable as he closes the distance between you with alarming speed. Caught off guard by his sudden aggression, you scramble to defend yourself.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer1_3
data.value: With your guidance, the adventurer gathers his belongings and rises to his feet, his steps steady and sure as he prepares to continue his journey through the dungeon. Though the path ahead may still be fraught with danger, you can see a glimmer of hope in his eyes—a determination to face whatever challenges lie ahead with courage and resolve.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer1_5
data.value: Despite the mad adventurer's wild attacks, you stand your ground with unwavering resolve. With a calm demeanor, you deflect his frenzied strikes, your movements precise and calculated.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer1_6
data.value: As the mad adventurer's frenzied onslaught continues unabated, you find yourself overwhelmed by the sheer ferocity of his attacks. Despite your best efforts to defend yourself, each blow lands with bone-jarring force, driving you to your knees beneath the weight of his madness. With a final, decisive blow, the adventurer delivers the finishing strike that sends you crashing to the ground in defeat. As consciousness slips away, the echoes of his laughter ring in your ears, a bitter reminder of your failure to overcome the darkness that consumes him.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer2_1
data.value: With empathy guiding your actions, you offer to help the lost adventurer find their way out of the treacherous dungeon. With a grateful nod, they accept your offer, their weary eyes brightening with newfound hope. Taking the lead, you guide the adventurer through the winding corridors and shadowed passages, your knowledge of the dungeon's layout proving invaluable as you navigate the maze-like labyrinth with ease.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer2_2
data.value: As you lead the adventurer through the labyrinthine corridors of the dungeon, a sense of uncertainty gnaws at the edges of your confidence. Each junction looks eerily similar, and despite your best efforts to recall the correct path, the way out remains frustratingly elusive. With each passing moment, the adventurer's patience wears thin, their frustration mounting as your hesitation prolongs their plight. Despite your assurances and attempts to remember, the pressure of the situation only serves to cloud your thoughts further, leaving you grasping at shadows in search of a way forward. As the minutes tick by, the adventurer's frustration boils over into anger, their trust in your guidance waning with each fruitless attempt to find the exit. With a cry of exasperation, they turn on you, their accusations ringing in your ears as they accuse you of leading them astray. Caught off guard by their sudden hostility, you find yourself on the defensive, desperately trying to explain yourself as the adventurer's blows rain down upon you with unrelenting force. With each strike, the weight of your failure bears down upon you, the realization of your shortcomings fueling their anger and resentment.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer2_3

As they disappear into the horizon, their silhouette fading against the backdrop of the setting sun, you can't help but feel a sense of fulfillment knowing that you've made a difference in their journey—a beacon of hope in the darkness, guiding them toward a brighter tomorrow.

data.value: As you encounter the lost adventurer in the dimly lit dungeon, his wild eyes and tense posture immediately set off alarms in your mind. The adventurer's startled expression registers too late as you close the distance between you, your strike aimed at incapacitating any potential threat. However, as your blade arcs toward him, you catch a glimpse of confusion and fear in the adventurer's eyes. His hands instinctively raise in a gesture of surrender, but the momentum of your attack is already in motion, leaving little room for hesitation.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer3_5

The blade connects with a resounding thud, knocking the adventurer to the ground with a pained grunt. Shock registers on both your faces as the gravity of the situation sinks in. With a heavy heart, you lower your weapon, the weight of your actions settling heavily upon you. Despite your intentions to protect yourself, you can't shake the feeling of guilt for the harm inflicted upon an innocent soul.

data.name: mountainsLostAdventurer3_6
data.value: However, to your surprise, the adventurer reacts with lightning reflexes, swiftly parrying your blows with practiced skill. data.name: mountainsMiniBoss
data.value: As you cautiously enter the cavern chamber, your senses alert to the slightest movement, you suddenly find yourself face-to-face with the massive form of a giant bear. With a thunderous roar that shakes the very foundation of the chamber, the bear charges forward, its massive bulk barreling towards you with terrifying speed.

data.name: mountainsMiniBoss1_1
data.value: Instinct takes over as you scramble to evade the oncoming beast, its claws slashing through the air with deadly intent. With a surge of adrenaline, you narrowly dodge the bear's powerful swipes, each missed strike sending shockwaves of force reverberating through the cavern.

data.name: mountainsMiniBoss1_5
data.value: With each passing moment, you analyze the bear's movements, searching for an opportunity to strike. As it lunges forward for another attack, you seize the moment, dodging its claws and delivering a precise blow to its vulnerable flank. The bear lets out a mighty roar of pain as your strike finds its mark, causing it to stagger backward in surprise. Sensing an advantage, you press the attack, raining down blows upon the beast with unrelenting force. With each strike, the bear's defenses weaken, its movements growing sluggish as fatigue sets in. Summoning the last reserves of your strength, you deliver a final, decisive blow that brings the mighty creature to its knees. With a deafening roar, the bear collapses to the ground, defeated by your skill and determination. As the echoes of battle fade away, you stand victorious over the fallen beast, your heart pounding with the thrill of conquest. Yet, amidst the triumph, you also feel a sense of respect for the majestic creature that once ruled this cavernous domain. With a solemn nod, you honor its memory before continuing your journey through the depths of the dungeon.

data.name: mountainsMiniBoss1_6
data.value: Despite your best efforts to defend yourself, the bear's relentless assault leaves you reeling, your breath coming in ragged gasps as you struggle to keep pace with its ferocious onslaught. With each passing moment, the enormity of the creature's strength becomes painfully clear, its primal rage driving it to overpower any who dare to intrude upon its territory. With a final, bone-shattering blow, the bear sends you crashing to the ground in defeat. As consciousness fades, the echoes of its triumphant roars ring in your ears, a bitter reminder of the harsh reality of survival in the unforgiving depths of the dungeon.

data.name: mountainsRestingPlace
data.value: As you weave your way through the labyrinthine passages of the dungeon, your weary footsteps lead you to a small alcove nestled within the cold stone walls. There, amidst the darkness, you spot a flickering light—a dimly lit campfire casting long shadows against the cavernous walls. Approaching cautiously, you find a makeshift resting place, illuminated by the soft glow of the fire. A sense of warmth and comfort washes over you as you draw nearer, the crackling flames offering a welcome respite from the oppressive darkness that surrounds you. Nearby, you notice a locked pantry, its sturdy wooden door standing as a barrier between you and whatever provisions lie within. Despite your curiosity, the pantry remains firmly shut, its contents hidden from view and inaccessible to all but those with the key.

data.name: mountainsRestingPlace1_1
data.value: The lock resists at first, stubborn and unyielding, but you refuse to be deterred. With each subtle adjustment, you feel the mechanism give way, inch by inch, until finally, with a satisfying click, the lock yields to your efforts, the pantry door swinging open with a creak of protest. With a triumphant grin, you peer inside, your eyes widening in anticipation at the sight of the provisions that lie within. Shelves lined with jars of preserved food and sacks of grain greet your eager gaze, a welcome bounty in the midst of the dungeon's harsh environs.

data.name: mountainsRestingPlace1_2
data.value: Despite your best efforts, the lock remains obstinately sealed, its mechanism resisting your attempts to manipulate it with finesse. Each delicate adjustment of your tools only serves to exacerbate the situation, the tumblers stubbornly refusing to yield to your efforts. Frustration mounts with each failed attempt, the metallic click of the lock echoing mockingly in the chamber as you struggle to overcome its defenses. Sweat beads upon your brow as time slips away, the dim light of the campfire casting long shadows across the chamber as you wrestle with the stubborn lock.

data.name: mountainsRestingPlace1_3
data.value: With a sense of satisfaction, you gather supplies to replenish your dwindling stores, grateful for the stroke of luck that led you to this hidden cache. As you secure the pantry once more and settle back beside the campfire, you can't help but feel a sense of pride in your resourcefulness—a testament to your skill and ingenuity in the face of adversity.

data.name: mountainsRestingPlace1_4
data.value: With a heavy sigh, you reluctantly concede defeat, your fingers trembling with exhaustion and disappointment. Despite your best efforts, the pantry door remains firmly shut, its contents tantalizingly out of reach and inaccessible to all but those with the key. Resigned to your fate, you settle back beside the campfire, the warmth of the flames offering scant comfort in the face of your disappointment. As you reflect on the trials that lie ahead, a sense of determination stirs within you, a silent vow to overcome whatever obstacles may stand in your path as you continue your journey through the depths of the dungeon.

data.name: mountainsRestingPlace2_1
data.value: With a weary sigh, you cast aside your lockpicking tools and abandon your attempts to breach the stubborn pantry door. Instead, you opt for a simpler solution, settling down beside the flickering campfire to rest your tired limbs and weary mind. As you recline against the cool stone wall, the warmth of the fire envelops you in a comforting embrace, its soft glow casting dancing shadows across the chamber. With each crackle and pop of the flames, you feel the tension of your journey begin to ebb away, replaced by a sense of calm and tranquility.

data.name: mountainsRestingPlace2_3
data.value: Closing your eyes, you allow yourself to succumb to the gentle lullaby of the crackling fire, the rhythmic dance of its flames soothing your frazzled nerves. Thoughts of the locked pantry fade into the background as you drift into a peaceful slumber, the cares and worries of the world slipping away with each passing moment. In this moment of respite, amidst the chaos and uncertainty of the dungeon, you find solace in the simple pleasures of rest and relaxation. With the warmth of the fire to guide you and the promise of a new day on the horizon, you allow yourself to surrender to the embrace of sleep, knowing that whatever challenges may lie ahead, you will face them with renewed strength and determination when the time comes.

data.name: mountainsRestingPlace3_1
data.value: With a lingering glance at the crackling campfire and the stubbornly locked pantry door, you realize that pressing on without rest is the wiser choice for now. Despite the allure of the warm flames and the tantalizing mystery of the pantry's contents, you know that your journey through the dungeon demands your full attention.

data.name: mountainsRestingPlace3_3
data.value: Gathering your belongings, you rise from your makeshift resting place and cast one last look around the chamber, committing the scene to memory before turning away. With a determined stride, you venture back into the darkened corridors of the dungeon, the echoes of your footsteps fading into the distance as you leave the campfire's glow behind.

data.name: mountainsSleepingBear
data.value: As you navigate through the winding passages of the mountain's caves, your senses alert for any signs of danger, you stumble upon a cavern bathed in a soft, dim light. Peering cautiously inside, your heart skips a beat as you catch sight of a massive form curled up in the shadows—a sleeping bear. The bear's fur ripples gently with each slow breath, its powerful frame a testament to the strength and ferocity that lies dormant within. Despite its peaceful appearance, you know better than to underestimate the danger it poses, especially if provoked from its slumber.

data.name: mountainsSleepingBear1_1
data.value: In a moment of panic, your survival instincts kick in, and without hesitation, you draw your weapon and launch into an attack. The clang of metal against fur pierces the silence of the chamber as you unleash a flurry of strikes against the unsuspecting beast. The bear's peaceful snores are replaced by a roar of anger and pain as it awakens to the sudden assault, its instinct for self-preservation driving it to defend itself against the unexpected threat. With each swipe of its massive claws and snap of its powerful jaws, the bear retaliates with deadly force, its fury matched only by your own desperation to survive.

With a sense of satisfaction, you wipe the sweat from your brow and continue your journey through the dungeon, knowing that with every challenge you overcome, you grow stronger and more resilient in the face of adversity.

In an instant, spikes shoot forth from the walls with deadly precision, hurtling toward you with terrifying speed. With nowhere to turn and no time to spare, you brace yourself for the inevitable impact, a sense of helplessness washing over you as the deadly projectiles close in. The spikes find their mark with unerring accuracy, piercing your flesh with searing pain as you stumble backward, the force of the impact sending you crashing to the ground in a tangle of limbs. Agony courses through your veins as you lie sprawled on the cold stone floor, the echoes of the trap's activation ringing in your ears.

data.name: mountainsSpearTrap2_4
data.value: Despite the pain and the overwhelming sense of defeat, you refuse to surrender to despair. With gritted teeth and a steely resolve, you drag yourself to your feet, the fire of determination burning bright in your eyes as you press onward, unwilling to let the trap's cruel machinations bring an end to your quest.

data.name: mountainsSpider
data.value: As you cautiously traverse the dimly lit cavern, your senses attuned to the slightest movement, you suddenly find yourself face-to-face with a monstrous spider, its bloated abdomen quivering with anticipation as it readies itself to strike. Instinctively, you freeze in your tracks, the hairs on the back of your neck standing on end as you meet the creature's eight beady eyes with a mix of fear and determination. With each slow, deliberate movement, the spider inches closer, its venomous fangs glistening in the dim light as it prepares to unleash its deadly assault.

data.name: mountainsSpider1_1
data.value: Reacting on pure adrenaline, you dodge the spider's attack with lightning-fast reflexes, narrowly avoiding its lethal strike by mere inches. With a surge of determination, you ready your weapon, prepared to face this monstrous foe head-on in a battle for survival. The cavern echoes with the sound of combat as you and the spider engage in a deadly dance of evasion and retaliation. With each blow, you chip away at the creature's defenses, inching closer to victory with every strike.

data.name: mountainsSpider1_5
data.value: Finally, with a final, well-placed blow, you deliver the decisive strike that brings the spider to its knees, defeated and vanquished by your unwavering resolve. As the echoes of battle fade into the darkness, you stand victorious over the fallen beast, your breath coming in ragged gasps as you survey the aftermath of the fierce struggle.

data.name: mountainsSpider1_6
data.value: As the monstrous spider lunges forward with terrifying speed, your heart races in your chest, and a surge of fear grips your senses. Despite your best efforts to evade its attack, the creature's razor-sharp fangs find their mark, sinking deep into your flesh with searing pain. Agony courses through your body as venom floods your veins, weakening your limbs and clouding your thoughts with a haze of darkness. With each passing moment, your movements grow sluggish, your once steady resolve crumbling beneath the weight of the spider's relentless assault. The spider delivers the finishing strike that sends you crashing to the ground in defeat. As consciousness slips away, the echoes of its triumphant hisses ring in your ears, a bitter reminder of your failure to overcome the monstrous foe that lurks within the depths of the dungeon.

data.name: mountainsWebbedPassage
data.value: As you venture deeper into the dungeon, your footsteps echoing softly against the cold stone floor, you come upon a narrow passage obscured by thick, silken strands of cobwebs. The air grows heavy with the musty scent of decay, and a shiver runs down your spine as you realize the passage ahead is enveloped in darkness. With a wary glance at the tangled mass of webs blocking your path, you steel yourself for what lies ahead. Drawing your weapon, you cautiously step forward, the strands of cobweb clinging to your clothing and skin as you push through the oppressive gloom.

data.name: mountainsWebbedPassage1_1
data.value: With grim determination, you forge ahead, pushing through the thick cobwebs that cling to your body like a suffocating shroud. Each step forward is met with resistance as the sticky strands pull at your limbs, but you refuse to be deterred. With a fierce resolve, you press on, hacking and slashing at the stubborn webs with your weapon as you navigate the winding passage. The air grows heavy with the musty scent of decay, and your heart pounds in your chest as you push deeper into the darkness. Despite the oppressive atmosphere and the relentless assault of the cobwebs, you refuse to falter. With each labored breath, you steel yourself against the mounting sense of dread, knowing that the only way out is through.

data.name: mountainsWebbedPassage1_2
data.value: As you press through the thick cobwebs, your progress slows to a crawl, each step becoming more arduous as the sticky strands cling relentlessly to your limbs. The oppressive weight of the webs begins to take its toll, sapping your strength and slowing your movements to a sluggish pace. With each labored breath, you push forward, the cobwebs becoming an increasingly formidable barrier between you and whatever lies beyond. Panic begins to gnaw at the edges of your mind as you struggle against the suffocating embrace of the webs, your heart racing with the fear of what may come. Suddenly, a chill runs down your spine as you sense a presence looming behind you. With a sinking feeling in the pit of your stomach, you realize that the huge spider has returned, drawn by the vibrations of your struggle and the scent of fresh prey. As you turn to face the approaching menace, dread washes over you like a tidal wave. With your movements hampered by the clinging cobwebs, you know that you are at a disadvantage against the creature's swift and deadly attacks.

data.name: mountainsWebbedPassage1_3
data.value: Finally, after what feels like an eternity, you emerge on the other side of the cobweb-filled passage, victorious in your struggle against the darkness. With a sigh of relief, you brush the clinging strands from your clothing and take a moment to catch your breath, grateful to have overcome yet another obstacle in your journey through the treacherous depths of the dungeon.

data.name: mountainsWebbedPassage1_5
data.value: Summoning every ounce of determination, you break free from the cobwebs, shaking off the venom's effects. With a roar, you launch a fierce counterattack, striking the spider with relentless fury. Despite the odds, you refuse to yield, delivering blow after blow until the creature finally falls defeated. With a triumphant cry, you emerge victorious, your spirit unbroken as you press on through the dungeon's depths.

data.name: mountainsWebbedPassage1_6
data.value: With lightning speed, the spider lunges forward, its venomous fangs sinking deep into your flesh with searing pain. Agony courses through your veins as the venom takes hold, paralyzing your muscles and clouding your mind with a haze of darkness. Desperate cries for help echo through the chamber, but they are drowned out by the relentless hiss of the spider's triumph. With each agonizing moment that passes, your strength ebbs away, leaving you defenseless against the creature's unyielding onslaught. As consciousness slips away, the echoes of its triumphant hisses ring in your ears, a bitter reminder of your failure to overcome the monstrous foe that lurks within the depths of the dungeon.

data.name: mountainsWebbedPassage2_1
data.value: With meticulous attention, you navigate through the dense cobwebs, each step weighed down by the sticky strands. Despite the gradual progress, you remain resolute, driven by the determination to breach the passage's entanglement. Time stretches on endlessly as the webs seem to multiply, enveloping you in a suffocating embrace of silk. Your movements grow labored, limbs heavy with exhaustion, yet you press on, fueled by an unyielding resolve to reach the other side. The oppressive darkness of the cobweb-laden passage threatens to engulf you, but you refuse to succumb to despair. With each painstaking step, you feel the weight of exhaustion creeping into your bones, threatening to halt your progress. Yet, you persist, drawing upon every ounce of strength and resilience within you to push forward. With each agonizing moment that passes, victory edges closer, a beacon of hope amidst the encroaching darkness.

data.name: mountainsWebbedPassage2_3
data.value: Finally, after what feels like an eternity, you emerge on the other side, battered and weary but triumphant. With a relieved exhale, you brush the clinging strands from your clothing, taking a moment to savor the sweet taste of success. Despite the obstacles overcome, you know that more challenges await in the treacherous depths of the dungeon, but for now, you bask in the glow of this hard-earned victory.

data.name: optionOtherText
data.value:
Gladiator RPG
A game made by Rav Games Studio Huge thanks to all testers that helped me with releasing the game :)
Report bugs or suggestions here : ravgamesstudio@gmail.com

data.name: statDexInfo
data.value: Increases chance to critical hit (counted after a hit)

data.name: statEndInfo
data.value: Decreases enemy's chance to critical hit, increases your HP regeneration by 1 for every point

data.name: statStrInfo
data.value: Every 10 points increases damage min by 1, every 5 points increases critical damage by 1% and max damage by 1. Increases damage dealt to armor (strength/enemylevel*3)

data.name: tipArena
data.value:
Arena
In the arena you can earn gold by winning fights with enemies based on your fame. You can choose which enemy to fight from 4 options. The harder the fight the more gold and fame you will earn.

data.name: tipArenaReward
data.value:
Arena rewards
If you are strong enough to defeat enemies with level above yours you will be able to recieve a good item reward. You need to have more fame than your level+1 times 10 or more. The higher the fame, the better the reward. It will be always the best rarity that item level can recieve.

data.name: tipArmor
data.value:
Armor
Armor decreases incoming damage at the cost of it. The more armor you have the higher damage reduction you have. After recieving damage armor value is decreased by base damage which was dealt. (At level 20 : 100 damage dealt to 1000 armor defendant, 55% damage is reduced to 45 raw damage, 100 armor is destroyed leaving defendant with 900 armor for the fight which reduces damage by 52%, it is restored AFTER the fight)

data.name: tipArmorDamage
data.value:
Armor Damage
Armor damage is calculated of attacker strength and defendant level. Armor damage value is damage prevented by armor reduction. It is modified by your armor damage multiplier. (At level 20 you deal 100 base damage to an enemy with 1000 armor and same level as you. You have armor damage multiplier of x1.5. You deal 45 raw damage to enemy's health and 85 (55*1.5 rounded down) damage to his armor which leaves him with 915 armor for the next round.)

data.name: tipBonusStat
data.value:
Bonus stats
Bonus stats are just added to your base stats, they are counting only in fights. They are not counted in work and dungeon stat tests.

data.name: tipCriticalHitChance
data.value:
Critical hit chance
Critical hit chance is calculated from attacker dexterity and defendant endurance with his level. Critical hit is rolled after hitting an enemy so missed attack can't change to critical hit. If hit it deals more damage based on attacker strength/5 + base 50%.

data.name: tipDamage
data.value:
Damage
Damage is calculated from weapon damage brackets which can be increased by strength stat or damage bonus from items. Furthermore it can be increased by rolling a critical hit. Damage is reduced by defendant's armor.

data.name: tipDungeonEvents
data.value:
Dungeon events
In the dungeon you can encounter different kind of events. Treasure events : Chance to earn gold and items. Fight events : As the name suggests it is just a fight. Trap events : Event which can cause damage to player if the test fails. Random events : Event which make player roll for a stat test. Can be anything from gold, heal to a fight. Stat tests are rolled from BASE stat value not counting bonuses from items. Mini boss : Optional fight which can award you good item and gold. Not required to finish a dungeon. Boss : Objective of a dungeon. To recieve the best reward you need to find and defeat the boss of the dungeon.

data.name: tipDungeonMovement
data.value:
Dungeon movement
In dungeon you explore the map searching for a boss of the dungeon. Each move costs stamina based on which dungeon you are currently in. You can't move outside of map. You can spend your stamina points to regenerate your lost hit points using your regen value for every point of stamina used.

data.name: tipDungeons
data.value:
Dungeons
Dungeons are quests to defeat a boss of an area. To reach the boss you must first find him during exploration of the map. During exploration you can encounter different enemies, treasures, traps or random events as well as mini boss which is not required to "win" a dungeon but gives a nice reward.

data.name: tipExpeditions
data.value:
Expeditions
Expeditions are timed activities for your gladiator. After time is up you will face an opponent based on which region you went on expedition. It is a great way to earn experience, gold and possible items. You can quicken up an expedition by clicking a SPEED UP button which costs 1 stamina per every minute left.

data.name: tipExperience
data.value:
Experience
Experience shows how much your gladiator have learned. By reaching an experience cap you gain next level.

data.name: tipFame
data.value:
Fame
Fame is only used in arena for generating enemy for you to fight. Level of generated enemies are based of fame/10. The higher the level of enemy the bigger are the rewards for victory. If you manage to obtain over 20 fame over your level*10 then you are able to recieve an item from the arena. Items which you can obtain this way have level of (fame*10)-2, so you can greed for better items.

data.name: tipFight
data.value:
Fight
Fights are calculated by rounds up to 30 rounds. To win a fight you must deal more percentage of enemy's health than he does. (You deal 20 damage to 100 health opponent and the opponent deals 35 damage to your 200 health during the whole fight, you dealt 20% of his hit points and the opponent dealt 17.5% of your hitpoints making you winner. 20%>17.5%)

data.name: tipFightRounds
data.value:
Fight rounds
Turns of player and enemy in round are simulated simultaneously. If any character has more than 1 hp then the next round is simulated up to 30 rounds. You can check the logs of the fight what happened in what round.

data.name: tipGold
data.value:
Gold
Gold is spent on training, buying items and entering a dungeon. It can be gain by winning fights on arena, expeditions and in dungeon, by working and selling items.

data.name: tipHitChance
data.value:
Hit chance
Hit chance is calculated from attacker perception and defendant agility. Missed attacks doesn't do any damage.

data.name: tipHitPoints
data.value:
Hit points
Your hit points determines how much you can take in a fight. After your hit points reach 1 you are automatically losing a fight. Also it increases your chance to win a fight by increasing overall damage which opponent must deal to reach higher percentage of it.

data.name: tipItems
data.value:
Items
Items are important for your character. Weapons gives damage brackets. Armor pieces gives armor points. Accessories does not gives damage or armor but can have buffs on them. Items from level 7 can have green buffs on them which gives random bonus to your stats and from level 14 every item contains a buff on it. Every 7th level up to 35 new tiers of buffs can be applied to item from green through blue, violet, orange up to red.

data.name: tipMultiHitChance
data.value:
Multi hit chance
Multi hit chance is calculated from attacker charisma and defendant endurance with his level. Multi hit chance is rolled after attack has occured even if it misses. Then every next attack can still roll next multi hit but with half of its value. (For example if you have 30% multi hit chance and it is rolled succesfully then after next attack you still roll for multi hit but with 15% and so on until you fail the roll.)

data.name: tipMultipliedStat
data.value:
Multiplied stats
Multiplied stats are percentage bonus to your base stats NOT INCLUDING bonus stats. So training a statistic is crucial to obtain higher value of multiplied stat bonus.

data.name: tipPlayerLevel
data.value:
Player level
Player level is level of your gladiator. At higher levels you gain access to more expeditions, dungeons, better pay for work and better items. It also determines your maximum stamina and training soft cap.

data.name: tipRegeneration
data.value:
Regeneration
Your health and stamina is regenerating every minute. Your hit points regenerate by a value of your endurance+1 and your stamina regenerates by 1.

data.name: tipShop
data.value:
Shop
Shop sells random items which are randomized after an hour. Level of those items are close to your level. Cost of the items is few times the cost of selling them so before you buy it check if it is useful for you.

data.name: tipStamina
data.value:
Stamina
Stamina can be used for speeding up remaining time of expedition and work, arena cooldown and for movement and actions in dungeons.

data.name: tipStatistics
data.value:
Statistics
Every stat is useful. Strength increases your damage, critical damage and armor damage. Perception increases your chance to hit an opponent based of his agility. Dexterity increases your chance to critically hit an opponent based of his endurance. Agility decreases enemy's chance to hit you base of his perception. Vitality increases your hit points. Endurance increases your hit points regeneration and decreases enemy's critical hit chance based of his dexterity. Charisma increases your multiple hit chance based of enemy's intelligence. Intelligence decreases enemy's multiple hit chance based of his charisma.

data.name: tipWork
data.value:
Work
Here you can send your gladiator for work. Choose how many hours you wish to work and pick where you wish to go. Pay is calculated based off your level and your stats. In the mines base strength and vitality increases your pay. In the forest base perception and intelligence. In the marketplace base agility and charisma. In the construction base dexterity and endurance. Each point of stat increases pay by 1%

data.name: trainingExplanation
data.value: Here you can increase base statistics of your gladiator. You can increase your stats indefinitely but if your stats exceed your maximum stamina then the cost of training increases.

data.name: tutorial1
data.value: Welcome to Gladiator RPG! First of all you should buy yourself a weapon, click on the city tab and buy a weapon of your choosing. 1/4

data.name: tutorial2
data.value: You have bought your first weapon! Head now back to the character tab, scroll down click your weapon and equip it. 2/4

data.name: tutorial3
data.value: Now you are ready to fight, navigate to city tab and arena subtab. 3/4

data.name: tutorial4
data.value: That's the end of the tutorial. Fight, gain experience, earn gold, train, buy equipment and the most important have fun :) 4/4

data.value: You finished your work. You were paid :

data.name: workPayoutText
data.value: You have finished your work and have been paid :

data.value: Do you want to speed up work? Cost :
